S04bsu016_u:824: darśanena śravaṇena anusmṛtyā paryupāsanena ca paripācitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:849: samantavyūhadharmaprabheṇa ca bodhisattvasamādhinā te bodhisattvāstān bhagavato vairocanasya buddhavikurvitasamudrānavataranti /

S04bsu016_u:947: yaduta cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe vipularaśmijālameghāḥ sarvajagatsaṃtoṣaṇā niścaritvā daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:948: sarvaratnamaṇighaṇṭāmegha niścaritvā sarvatryadhvatathāgataguṇavarṇanirdeśameghanirnādānanuravanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:949: sarvajagadvādyameghaḥ sarvārambaṇebhyo niścaritvā sarvasattvakarmavipākamadhuravādyaghoṣasaṃprayuktā anuvaranto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /

S04bsu016_u:952: sarvatryadhvatathāgatasadṛśabodhimaṇḍameghā niścaritvā sarvatathāgatātisaṃbodhiniryāṇavyūhān saṃdarśayanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:953: sarvārambaṇebhyaḥ sarvanāgendrakāyameghā niścaritvā sarvagandhavarṣāṇi pravarṣanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:954: sarvajagadindrasadṛśakāyameghā niścaritvā samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāmudīrayanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:955: sarvārambaṇebhyaḥ sarvaratnamayasarvapariśuddhabuddhakṣetrapratibhāsameghā niścaritvā sarvatathāgatadharmacakrapravartanāni darśayanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:956: evaṃpramukhā anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā mahāvyūhavikurvitameghā niścaranti sma teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmadhiṣṭhānena acintyadharmasamudrāvabhāsapratilābhadharmatayā ca //
S04bsu016_u:957: atha khalu mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena etānyeva sarvavikurvitāni saṃdarśayan daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:958: saṃprekṣato jetavane anantaṃ buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ vipulaṃ pravṛttam /
S04bsu016_u:959: ārambaṇā sarvatu kāyameghā niścārya te sarvadiśaḥ spharanti // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:960: anantavarṇā vipulā viśuddhā vyūhā vicitrāḥ sugatātmajānām /

S04bsu016_u:963: romṇāṃ mukhebhyaḥ sugatātmajānāṃ rutāni bauddhāni nigarjamānāḥ // 13 //

S04bsu016_u:990: niścaritvā sarvadikṣu dharmadhātuṃ spharitvā sattvān saṃbodhayanti paripācayanti vinayanti /

S04bsu016_u:995_2: asaṃbhinnena jñānena asaṃbhinnena sattvasaṃgrahaprayogena darśanavainayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:997: kecit svabhavanakūṭāgārāsanaparivārā daśa diśaḥ spharantaḥ saṃdṛśyante,
S04bsu016_u:1006: atha khalu mañjuśrīrapi kumarabhūtaḥ pratiṣṭhānakūṭāgāragataḥ sārdhaṃ sabhāgacaritairbodhisattvaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:1031: atha khalu āyuṣmān śariputro buddhānubhāvena adrākṣīnmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamanayā īdṛśyā bodhisattvavikurvitavyūhasaṃpadā jetavanānniṣkamya yena dakṣiṇā dik tenopasaṃkramamāṇam /
S04bsu016_u:1032: dṛṣṭvā ca asyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ janapadacaryāṃ prakrameyam /
S04bsu016_u:1033: sa ṣaṣṭimātrairbhikṣubhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu016_u:1034_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantamavalokya bhagavatābhyanujñāto
S04bsu016_u:1034_1: bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikātprakramya yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopajagāma
S04bsu016_u:1038: puṇyaprabheṇa ca mahāvatsena ca vibhudattena ca viśuddhacāriṇā ca devaśriyā ca indramatinā ca brahmottamena ca praśāntamatinā ca bhikṣuṇā /
S04bsu016_u:1040_0: sarve ca te bhikṣavaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā dūrānugatādhimuktayaḥ
S04bsu016_u:1041_0: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputro gacchanneva mārgaṃ sarvāstān bhikṣūnavalokya sāgarabuddhiṃ
S04bsu016_u:1041_1: bhikṣumāmantrayāmāsa - paśya sāgarabuddhe mañjuśriyo bodhisattvasya kāyapariśuddhimacintyāṃ sadevakena lokena,
S04bsu016_u:1046: mārgavikramavyūhāṃśca sarvadigmaṇḍalābhimukhān vartamānān puṇyasamyagvyūhāṃśca vāmadakṣiṇena mahānidhānānyudvelāni bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:1049: daśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvatathāgatorṇākośebhyo raśmijālamaṇḍalāni niścaritvā sarvabuddhadharmānnigarjamānān mūrdhni nipatanti /
S04bsu016_u:1050: evaṃpramukhānāyuṣmān śāriputro mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya aparimāṇān mārgakramaṇaguṇavyūhāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:1051: bhāṣate udīrayati prabhāvayati saṃvarṇayati vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti /
S04bsu016_u:1052: yathā yathā svaviraḥ śāriputro mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya guṇānudīrayati,
S04bsu016_u:1053: tathā tathā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cittāni viśuddhyanti prasīdanti,
S04bsu016_u:1070: te evamudāraṃ sarvajñatāprasādavegaṃ pratilabdhā etadavocan - upanayatu upādhyāyo 'smānetasya satpuruṣasya sakāśam / atha khalu
S04bsu016_u:1071: āyuṣmān śāriputra trairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya etadavocat - ime mañjuśrīḥ bhikṣavaḥ tvaddarśanakāmāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:1072: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto mahatā bodhisattvavikurvitena sārdha parṣanmaṇḍalapramāṇena bhūmimaṇḍalena nāgāvalokitena pratyudāvṛtya tān bhikṣūnavalokayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:1073_0: atha khalu te bhikṣavo mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirobhirabhivandya añjalīn
S04bsu016_u:1073_1: pragṛhya etadavocan - anena vayaṃ satpuruṣa tvaddarśanakuśalamūlena yadapyasmākamanyatkuśalamūlaṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe,
S04bsu016_u:1076: tena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena īdṛśā eva bhavem,
S04bsu016_u:1082_0: evamukte ebhirbhikṣubhiḥ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastān bhikṣūnidamavocat - daśabhiraparikhedacittotpādaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:1082_1: samanvāgato bhikṣavo mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā [Gv_38] tathāgatabhūmimavakrāmati,
S04bsu016_u:1096: ebhirbhikṣavo daśabhiraparikhedacittotpādaiḥ samanvāgataḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā saṃvartate sarvakuśalamūleṣu,
S04bsu016_u:1108: atha khalu te bhikṣava imaṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā sarvabuddhavidarśanāsaṅgacakṣurviṣayaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratyalabhanta,
S04bsu016_u:1110: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvajagatyupapannāḥ sattvāstānaśeṣānadrākṣuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:1114: ye ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nānāratnamayā bhavanavimānaparibhogāstānapi paśyanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:1117: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ cittendriyāśayān vyavalokayanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:1125: te mahāvabhāsapratilabdhā mahāprajñāmaṇḍalāvabhāsitā daśa bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhante sma /
S04bsu016_u:1126: tān mṛdusūkṣmābhijñāṅkurapratilabdhān bodhicittotpādadṛḍhapratiṣṭhitān mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ samantabhadrāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ samādāpya pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:1128: te mahāpraṇidhānasāgarābhinirhṛtayā cittaviśuddhyā kāyaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhante sma /
S04bsu016_u:1133: daśasu ca dikṣu sarvatathāgatakāyameghānabhinirharanti sma sarvabuddhadharmapariniṣpattaye //
S04bsu016_u:1134: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastān bhikṣūnanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpya anupūrveṇa janapadacaryāṃ caran yena dakṣiṇāpathe dhanyākaraṃ nāma mahānagaraṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:1135_0: upetya dhanyākarasya mahānagarasya pūrveṇa vicitrasāradhvajavyūhaṃ nāma mahāvanaṣaṇḍaṃ
S04bsu016_u:1136: yatra bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā aneke duṣkaraparityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:1139: tatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto dharmadhātunayaprabhāsaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ prakāśayāmāsa daśasūtrāntakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprasravam /
S04bsu016_u:1141: te taṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā nāgagatiṃ vijugupsantastathāgataguṇān spṛhayanto nāgagatiṃ vivartya devamanuṣyopapattiṃ parigṛhṇanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:1143: tasya taṃ dharmaṃ deśayataḥ kālāntareṇa anantamadhyasattvadhāturvinayaṃ gatastribhiryānaiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:1144: aśrauṣurdhanyākaramanuṣyāḥ - mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ idaṃ dhanyākaraṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:1146: śrutvā ca punarupāsakopāsikā dārakadārikā mahāprajñopāsakaśreṣṭhipūrvaṃgamāḥ pratyekaṃ pañcaśataparivārā dhanyākarānnagarānniṣkramya yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:1147_0: tatra mahāprajñopāsakaḥ sudattena copāsakena sārdhaṃ vasudattena ca puṇyaprabheṇa
S04bsu016_u:1147_1: ca yaśodevena ca somaśrityā ca somanandinā ca sumatinā ca mahāmatinā ca rāhulabhadreṇa
S04bsu016_u:1147_2: ca bhadraśriyā copāsakena sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhirupāsakaśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ
S04bsu016_u:1147_3: puraskṛtaḥ yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya
S04bsu016_u:1147_4: pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat //
S04bsu016_u:1148_0: tatra mahāprajñā nāmopāsikā suprabhayā copāsikayā sārdhaṃ sugātrayā ca subhadrayā
S04bsu016_u:1148_1: ca bhadraśriyā ca candraprabhāsayā ca ketuprabhayā ca śrībhadrayā ca sulocanayā copāsikayā
S04bsu016_u:1148_2: sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhirupāsikāśataiḥ parivṛtā puraskṛtā yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:1148_3: mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat //
S04bsu016_u:1149_0: tatra sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ suvratena ca śreṣṭhidārakeṇa sārdhaṃ suśīlena ca svācāreṇa
S04bsu016_u:1149_1: ca suvikrāmīṇā ca sucintinā ca sumatinā ca subuddhinā ca sunetreṇa ca subāhunā ca
S04bsu016_u:1149_2: [Gv_40] suprabheṇa ca śreṣṭhidārakeṇa sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ śreiṣṭhidārakaśataiḥ
S04bsu016_u:1149_3: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya
S04bsu016_u:1149_4: pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat //
S04bsu016_u:1150_0: tatra subhadrā dārikā mahāprajñasya gṛhapaterduhitā bhadrayā ca dārikayā sārdhamabhirāmavartayā
S04bsu016_u:1150_1: ca dṛḍhamatyā ca śrībhadrayā ca brahmadattayā ca śrīprabhayā ca suprabhayā dārikayā
S04bsu016_u:1150_2: sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ parivṛtā puraskṛtā yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:1150_3: mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat //
S04bsu016_u:1151_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto dhanyākarānnagarāt tāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:1152: (sudhanaḥ khalu punaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kena kāraṇenocyate sudhana iti?
S04bsu016_u:1153: sudhanasya khalu śreṣṭhidārakasya samanantarāvakrāntasya mātuḥ kukṣau tasmin gṛhe sapta ratnāṅkurāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ samantādgṛhasya suvibhaktāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:1155: yataste ratnāṅkurāḥ samutpatya dharaṇitalamabhinirbhidya abhyudgatāḥ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāaragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya /

S04bsu016_u:2769_1: evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmākaṃ divyasaṃgītiṣu ratirna bhavati /

S04bsu016_u:2777: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra asya saṃprekṣitena imāni meruśikharāṇi saṃprakampitāni /
S04bsu016_u:2778: te vayaṃ vyathitasaṃvignacittāḥ sarvajñatācittotpādanadṛḍhatayā sarvajñatājñāne praṇidhimabhinirharāmaḥ //

S04bsu016_u:2779_2: evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo mahāgniskandharāśibhya ābhāḥ pramuktāḥ

S04bsu016_u:2791_1: svabhavaneṣu vasatāmasya pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhya ābhā niścaritvā asmadbhavanānyavabhāsayati /

S04bsu016_u:2796: pañcatapastapyato 'smākaṃ sarve 'suralokāḥ sasāgarāṇi saśailāni ca mahāpṛthivīmaṇḍalāni prakampante /

S04bsu016_u:2931_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sudarśano bhikṣustenopasaṃkramya sudarśanasya

S04bsu016_u:4200: kiṃ mayā śakyamacintyāprameyaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum?

S04bsu016_u:6182: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ svakasvakān karmasamudrānavataranti sma,
S04bsu016_u:6183: karmasmṛtijñānaṃ ca pratyalabhanta - saptabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6184: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvakuśalamūlasaṃbhavanirghoṣā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:6185: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ paripūrṇā avikalasarvendriyāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante sma - ṣaḍbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6187: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ udārātiśayatayā vikurvanti sma - pañcabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6189: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvākārāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadrākṣuḥ caturbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6190: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvatathāgataviṣayāsaṃbhedapradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:6191: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya sarvatrānugatavikurvitamavataranti sma - tribhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6193: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatamabhimukhamadhimucyāpaśyan - dvābhyāṃ varṣasahasrābhyāṃ sa tathāgata utpasyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6194: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt tryadhvajñānavidyutpradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra satathāgatapūrvayoganirghoṣā nāma,
S04bsu016_u:6195: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvayogasamudrānavakalpayāmāsuravataranti
S04bsu016_u:6196: sma - varṣasahasreṇa sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6198: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ samantacakṣuṣkatāṃ pratyalabhanta sarvatathāgatavikurvitabuddhakṣetrasarvasattvadarśanatāyai - varṣaśatena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6200: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatotpādasaṃjñāṃ pratyalabhanta - saptāhena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6202: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ buddhadarśanamahāprītivegasaṃjātā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:6203_1: sattvān paripācya saptame divase pūrṇe [Gv_210] sarvaṃ taṃ lokadhātumapramāṇaiḥ saṃkampananayaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:6203_2: saṃkampya ekāntapariśuddhāmadhyatiṣṭhat yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6204: tāmapi sarvāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tatra buddhakṣetranānāvidhācintyavyūhān saṃdarśayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:6205: atha paścime saptāhe ye tatra lokadhātau sattvā buddhadarśanaparipakvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6207_0: atha khalu tasmin lokadhātau sarvacakravālebhya sarvasumerubhyaḥ sarvaparvatebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:6208: teṣāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmaparivārāṇāṃ mahāratnapadmānāṃ kesarakarṇikāsu daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni mahāmaṇiratnagarbhāṇi siṃhāsanāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:6209: teṣu ca maṇiratnagarbheṣvāsaneṣu daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvāḥ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ prādurbabhūvuḥ //
S04bsu016_u:6210: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhasya tasya bhagavataḥ samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājñaḥ tathāgatasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim,
S04bsu016_u:6211: atha tāvadeva daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātutathāgatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāmabhimukhaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6212: tena tato lokadhātoraprameyāḥ sattvāḥ sarvadurgativinipātebhyo vinivartitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6230_0: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ
S04bsu016_u:6230_1: praticittakṣaṇamanantāprameyāḥ sattvā dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ caturthyāṃ pañcabhyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:6234: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ praticittakṣaṇamanantamadhyasattvadhāturvinayamagamat /
S04bsu016_u:6235: tasmiṃśca lokadhātau sarvasattvā yathāśayāstasya tathāgatasya nānātmabhāvopāyakauśalyapramuktāṃ dharmadeśanāmājānanti sma //
S04bsu016_u:6236_0: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnakusumapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpavarṇaviṣayaparibhogamadamattānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:6239: yā ca rājñaścakravartino vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍasya svaśarīraniryātā prabhā,
S04bsu016_u:6245: sā ca sarvā na prajñāyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:6246: tadyathāpi nāma āditye udite vigate 'ndhakāre na candragrahanakṣatrajyotiṣāṃ nāgnerna maṇīnāṃ prabhā prajñāyate sma,
S04bsu016_u:6247: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya prabhayābhibhūtāḥ tatra jambudvīpe sarvaprabhā na prajñāyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:6248: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadakanakabimbasya purato maṣivigraho na śobhate na bhāsate na tapati na virocate,
S04bsu016_u:6249: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpakāyā na śobhante,
S04bsu016_u:6253: teṣāmetadabhavat - ko 'nvayaṃ bhaviṣyati devo vā brahmā vā,
S04bsu016_u:6256: na tapāmo na virocāmahe kāyena vā prabhayā vā śubhayā vā varṇena vā tejasā vā?
S04bsu016_u:6258_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvaḥ tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā madhye
S04bsu016_u:6258_2: taṃ vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaṃ rājānaṃ cakravartinametadavocat - yat khalu
S04bsu016_u:6258_3: mahārāja jānīyāḥ - tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6260_1: bodhisattvasya rūpakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhāvikurvitamābharaṇanirghoṣaṃ ca śrutvā mahāprītiprāmodyavegajātā
S04bsu016_u:6260_2: tasyāṃ velāyāmevaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - yanme kiṃcidupacitakuśalamūlaṃ tenāhamīdṛśaṃ
S04bsu016_u:6265: yathā anenāndhakārāyāṃ rātrau sattvānāmavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayya buddhotpādaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6269: atha khalu kulaputra vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaścakravartī sādha caturaṅgena balakāyena,
S04bsu016_u:6274_0: mahatā rājānubhāvena tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā uccālya yojanamūrdhvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:6274_1: vihāyasyabhyudgamya sarvaṃ jambudvīpaṃ sarvāvatīṃ cāturdvīpikalokadhātuṃ mahāvabhāsena
S04bsu016_u:6306_1: śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ
S04bsu016_u:6308_0: atha tānyābharaṇāni tasya bhagavataḥ upari mūrdhasaṃdhau mahāmaṇiratnābharaṇacchatraṃ
S04bsu016_u:6309: tasya madhye dharmadhātuprabhavasarvaratnamaṇiśākhāpralambaṃ nāma mahābodhivṛkṣamadrākṣīt anantamadhyavyūhanirdeśaṃ pradakṣiṇanānāvyūhasaṃdarśanam /
S04bsu016_u:6321: tāsu ca lokadhātuṣvekaikasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūnadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:6341: dṛṣṭvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā mahāprītiprasādavegān pratyalabhata //
S04bsu016_u:6343: tasyāstaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śrutvā daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇyavakrāntāni mṛdūni sukhasaṃsparśanāni /
S04bsu016_u:6344: tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrāntasya garbhasya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānam,
S04bsu016_u:6361_0: sā sūkṣmasamāhitacittā aniñjanacittā praharṣitacittā samāśvāsitacittā anābhāsacittā
S04bsu016_u:6361_4: abhinnacittā anunnatacittā anavanatacittā akhinnacittā anivartyacittā asaṃsīdanacittā
S04bsu016_u:6363: daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ praṇidhānasamudraiḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānaṃ svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye 'bhinirharati sma,
S04bsu016_u:6366: sa bhagavān samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājastathāgataḥ pūrvakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayati udyotayati saṃdarśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati saṃprakāśayati sārīkaroti avipraṇāśatāyai,
S04bsu016_u:6370_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani tataḥ pareṇa daśame kalpe maṇisūryacandravidyotitaprabhāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:6374: sā tena kuśalamūlena avinipātadharmiṇī sadā devendrakuleṣu manuṣyendrakuleṣu copapannā,
S04bsu016_u:6375: sarvatra cābhirūpābhūt prāsādikā darśanīyā paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā /
S04bsu016_u:6377: tenaiva ca kalyāṇamitreṇa tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau paripācitā saṃcoditā smāritā /
S04bsu016_u:6378: etarhi ca punastayā samantabhadro bodhisattva ārāgito 'tyantāvirāgaṇatayā //
S04bsu016_u:6379: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājacakravartī?
S04bsu016_u:6380: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:6381: maitreyaḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājābhūccakravartī /
S04bsu016_u:6382: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena saṃpūrṇaśrīvakrā nāma rājabhāryābhūt?
S04bsu016_u:6386: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā nāma rājaduhitā abhūt?
S04bsu016_u:6388: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā nāma rājaduhitā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:6389: yanme dārikābhūtayā indradhvajaketostathāgatasya pravacane pralugnastathāgatavigrahaḥ padmodgataḥ pratisaṃskāritaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6391: yadā cāsmi samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
S04bsu016_u:6392: sa me kulaputra prathamacittotpādo bodhāya abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:6393: yadā ca sa me bhagavān samantajñānārciḥśrīguṇaketurājaḥ tathāgata upasaṃkramya ābharaṇairavakīrṇaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6394: tathāgatavikurvitaprātihāryaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā dharmaśca me tasya bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6396: sarve ca te sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6401_0: teṣu ca me tathāgateṣu tīvraṃ gauravaṃ pratilabdhaṃ yathārūpeṇa gauraveṇa ekacittakṣaṇe
S04bsu016_u:6401_1: tān sarvāṃstathāgatāṃstāni bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni tāni ca sarvāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi paśyāmi //
S04bsu016_u:6402: tasyāṃ ca vairocanaśriyāṃ lokadhātau saṃvṛttāyāṃ tatra ca virajomaṇḍale kalpe nirgate 'nantare maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhā nāma lokadhāturmahāprabhaśca nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:6405: tasmiṃśca khalu mahāprabhe kalpe mahākaruṇameghadhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ prāthamakalpiko 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:6409: tena ca me sarvabuddhotpādasaṃbhavo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6413: tena ca me tryadhvāvabhāsagarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6415: tasyānantaraṃ sarvadharmasamudrābhyudgatavegarājo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:6417: tena ca me sarvadharmadhātutalajñānabhedo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ pañcasūtrāntaśataparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6421: tena ca me prītisāgaravivardhanavego nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśasūtrāntakoṭīśatasahasraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6424: sa ca me sāgaradevatābhūtayā ratnapadmameghavarṣairupasaṃkramya pūjitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6425: tena ca me dharmadhātusāgaranayaprabho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6429: sa me pañcābhijñaṛṣibhūtayā maharddhivikurvitena ṣaṣṭiṛṣisahasraparivṛtayā upasaṃkramaya gandhapuṣpaśikharameghānabhipravarṣantyā pūjitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6430: tena ca me anālayadharmapradīpo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ ṣaṣṭisūtrāntasahasraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6433: ahaṃ ca samatārthasaṃbhavā nāma pṛthivīdevatā abhuvam /
S04bsu016_u:6434: sā ahamaprameyapṛthivīdevatāparivārā sarvaratnadrumakośebhyo ratnapuṣpameghavarṣāṇyutsṛjamānā sarvaratnahārameghān pravarṣamāṇā upasaṃkrāntā tasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:6435: tena ca me sarvatathāgatasaṃbhavajñānākaragarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito 'prameyasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6436: sa ca me śrutvā dhārito na vipraṇāśitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6437: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra pañcānāṃ buddhaśatānāṃ sarvapaścimo dharmadhātugaganapūrṇaratnaśikharaśrīpradīpo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:6438: ahaṃ ca tena kālena abhirāmaśrīvakrā nāma [Gv_217] naṭadārikā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:6439: sā ahaṃ tasya tathāgatasya nagarapraveśasamaye nāṭake pravṛtte buddhānubhāvena ūrdhvaṃ gaganatale sthitvā gāthāsahasreṇa taṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭuvantī upasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:6440: tena ca me dharmadhātuvidyotitavyūhaṃ nāma raśmimūrṇakośādutsṛjya sarvakāyo 'vabhāsitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6441: tayā ca me raśmyā samanantaraspṛṣṭayā dharmadhātunayāvartagarbho nāma vimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ //
S04bsu016_u:6442: iti hi kulaputra etān pramukhān kṛtvā yāni tatra maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāprabhe kalpe pañca buddhaśatānyutpannāni,
S04bsu016_u:6444: pūjā ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kṛtā /
S04bsu016_u:6448: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmantyā aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto buddhadharmasaṃvarṇanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:6449_0: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasya antikāt tryadhvajñānagarbhadharmadhātuvipulo nāma dharmadhātuśarīrasāgaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:6451: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sahadarśanāt sarvajñatāvidyudavabhāsā āśaye 'vakrāntā apratilabdhapūrvā adṛṣṭapūrvāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6455_0: atha khalu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tameva sarvalokābhimukhajagadvinayanidarśanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:6455_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ
S04bsu016_u:6456: śṛṇu sūdhanā vacanametu mamā gambhīra durdṛśa durāvagaham /
S04bsu016_u:6458: yatha saṃbhuta prathama cittu mamā bodhāya buddhaguṇaprārthanayā /
S04bsu016_u:6459: yatha bodhivimokṣu ayu labdhu maṃyā etaṃ śṛṇohi pravibhāganayam // 31 //
S04bsu016_u:6462: kalpo abhū virajamaṇḍalu yo acchinnu yatra jinavaṃśu abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:6465: dharmadhvajaḥ śirisumeru jino guṇakeśarīśvaru caturtha jinaḥ // 34 //
S04bsu016_u:6467: jinabhāskaraḥ śaśimukho bhagavānete daśa prathama atra naye // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:6471: padmodgato navamu kāruṇiko jinu dharmadhātukusumo daśamaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6472: buddhosamudra paridīpayato eṣā daśā dvitiya atra naye // 37 //
S04bsu016_u:6475: vikrāntadevagati nāma jino tatha dharmadhātupadumo daśamaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6476: evaṃ nayaṃ vipula darśayato tṛtiyā daśā bhavati atra naye // 39 //
S04bsu016_u:6482: varalakṣaṇaḥ śiri babhūva jino bratamaṇḍalaśca svaśarīraprabhaḥ // 42 //
S04bsu016_u:6484: aparājitavratadhvajo bhagavān drumaparvato daśamu teṣa jinaḥ // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:6494: abhyudgatābhu abhu tatra jinastadanantaraṃ samaśarīru jinaḥ // 48 //
S04bsu016_u:6510: ete jinā pramukha tatra abhūdupapadyi ye jina pradīpakarāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6513: te sarvi pūjita mayā sugatā etaṃ vimokṣanayamotariyā // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:6514: kalpānananta ahu cīrṇa purā etaṃ vimokṣanayu bhāvayatī /
S04bsu016_u:6515: tvamapi śruṇitva pratipadya laghu pratilapsyase nayamimaṃ nacirāt // 58 //

S04bsu016_u:7545: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena padmaprabhā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt,
S04bsu016_u:7546: yayā sa upapādukaḥ kumāraḥ utsaṅge pratigṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7547: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūtsarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ pitā?
S04bsu016_u:7549: śuddhodanaḥ sa rājā tena kālena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7550: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7552: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:7553: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anye tena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:7554: ye tatra jambudvīpe upapannāḥ rājñā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣeṇa caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ?
S04bsu016_u:7556: ime te bodhisattvāḥ sarve ihaiva bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamavasṛtā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7558: kecid dvitīyāyāṃ kecitṛtīyāyāṃ keciccaturthyāṃ bhūmau kecitpañcamyāṃ kecitṣaṭhyāṃ kecitsaptamyāṃ kecidaṣṭabhyāṃ kecinnavamyāṃ keciddaśamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7560_0: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva vipulaprītisaṃbhavanidhānasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7560_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:7561: cakṣurmamā jinasutā vipulaṃ yeno vilokayami sarvadiśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7562: kṣetrodadhīn bahuvidhān vipulān sattvārṇavānapi ca saṃsarataḥ // 71 //
S04bsu016_u:7572: sattvān gatiṣvapi ca saṃsarato buddhān vikurvitagaṇaiśca saha // 76 //
S04bsu016_u:7573: tacca smarāmi khalu lokavidāṃ teṣāṃ yathā prathamakaḥ praṇidhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7579: yā nirvṛtīparimāṇaguṇā dharmasthiterapi ca yo niyamaḥ // 79 //
S04bsu016_u:7580: ye yānasāgaranayā vimalā ye caiva sattvavinayā vipulāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7583: mama bhāvito vipula kalpaśatānyetaṃ tvamapyavatarāśu nayam // 81 //
S04bsu016_u:7587: iyamihaiva bodhimaṇḍe sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā nāma rātridevatā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:7588: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:7592_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:7595: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7597: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā praṇamya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān darśananayānanusmaramāṇo 'ntaradharaṇitale praṇipatya suciramatināmayāmāsa //
S04bsu016_u:7598_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tasmāddharaṇitalādutthāya prāñjalībhūtaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā
S04bsu016_u:7598_1: rātridevatāyāḥ kāyaṃ nirīkṣamāṇo daśa saṃjñāviśuddhīḥ pratilabhate sma,
S04bsu016_u:7612: yāsāṃ pratilābhāt sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvasabhāgatāḥ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:7698_0: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prasannacittaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7698_1: rātridevatāmavalokayan āsāṃ daśānāṃ saṃjñāviśuddhīnāṃ pratilābhādetatpramukhān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:7699_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā
S04bsu016_u:7700: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:7701: yathā svacitte vaśitā mamāsti chandaśca bodhau sudṛḍho 'nivartyaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7702: tvadīyacitte 'pi hi me tathaiva svataiva devyadya dṛḍhopajātā // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:7705: cittaṃ guṇaughaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ me pṛthagvidhaiḥ sattvahitapravṛttaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7707: nidarśitā te khalu sarvadharmān niṣpattirārye madanugrahāya /
S04bsu016_u:7714: puṇyārṇavā me gaganapramāṇāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ cetasi codbhavanti // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:7717: saṃvardhitaḥ sarvaguṇaiḥ śubhaiśca sarvajñapaṭṭaṃ nacireṇa lapsye // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:7720: sarve yato 'rthāḥ prabhavanti cāsmāt siddhaśca kalyāṇaguṇairupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7722: ācāryabhūtā mi guṇāprameye sarvajñadharmeṣu mama praṇetrī /
S04bsu016_u:7723: na kalpakoṭīnayutairasaṃkhyaiḥ śakyaṃ mayā te pratikartumārye // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:7724_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7725: vadasva me devate - ko nāmāyaṃ vimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:7728: evamukte sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sarvasattvaparipākasaṃcodanakuśalasaṃbhavo nāma kulaputra ayaṃ vimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7729_0: ahaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā sarvadharmasvabhāvavasamatāmanubuddhya
S04bsu016_u:7729_1: sarvadharmaprakṛtimavatīrya anālayaṃ dharmaṃ niśritya sarvalokoccālitā suvibhaktarūpatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7729_2: dharmāṇāmavatīrya avisabhāgavarṇā avaivartavarṇā avikalpavarṇā anīlavarṇā apītavarṇā
S04bsu016_u:7729_4: avisabhāgā anānātvā avaimātryā avikalpā anīlā apītā alohitā anavadātavarṇā,
S04bsu016_u:7733_5: ca tathāgatasya anantamadhyāni vikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānā pūrvakāṇi kuśalamūlāni saṃcodayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:7737: praticittakṣaṇaṃ ca anantamadhyaṃ sattvadhātumanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avivartyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi //
S04bsu016_u:7738: yatpunaḥ kulaputra evaṃ vadasi - kiyaccirasaṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S04bsu016_u:7742: na tatra saṃsāradīrghatā vā saṃsārahrasvatā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate /
S04bsu016_u:7743: kalpasaṃkliṣṭatā vā kalpaviśuddhatā vā kalpaparīttatā vā kalpamahadgatatā vā kalpabahutvaṃ vā kalpanānātvaṃ vā kalpanānākaraṇaṃ vā kalpavimātratā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate vā /
S04bsu016_u:7745: prakṛtisvabhāvapariśuddhaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ sarvasaṃjñājālanirmuktaṃ sarvāvaraṇaparvatasamatikrāntamāśaye udeti /
S04bsu016_u:7747: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍale rātriṃdivaṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate,
S04bsu016_u:7750: udāgate ca sūryamaṇḍale divasaḥ prajñāyate prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:7751: evameva kulaputra avikalpe bodhisattvajñānamaṇḍale sarvakalpavikalpaparikalpā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:7753: atha ca punarbodhisattvāśayoditā vikalpajñānamaṇḍalaprabhena sarvasattvaparipākakālavaśena kalpasaṃvāsasaṃsārasaṃjñāgatagaṇanāsaṃkhyā prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:7755_0: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍalaṃ gaganatalagataṃ sarvaratnaparvateṣu sarvaratnadrumeṣu
S04bsu016_u:7769: na cāsya kalpe dīrghasaṃjñā bhavati na hrasvasaṃjñā /
S04bsu016_u:7773: tadyathā kulaputra mahānadyādiṣu yānapātraṃ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya prayuktamapratiprasrabdhaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:7774: yāvajjīvaṃ na cāsya apārime tīre 'bhiniveśo bhavati na pārime,
S04bsu016_u:7776: evameva kulaputra bodhisattvo mahāpāramitāyānapātrabalena saṃsāranadīsrotasaḥ sarvasattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:7777: na cāsya apārime tīre utrtrāso bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:7779: atha ca punaḥ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:7783: evameva kulaputra bodhisattva āśayajñānagaganatalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānavātamaṇḍalīparivṛtaṃ sarvadurgatiprapātebhyaḥ sattvān saṃdhārayamāṇaḥ na parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:7788: tadyathā kulaputra māyāgatanivṛttasya puruṣasya sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaparipūrṇasya daśa śarīrasthā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:7794: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ vā pīḍā vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:7797_0: yaduta saṃsārābhilāṣo vā saṃsārabhavagatyupapattinirvedo vā viṣayaratyanunayo vā
S04bsu016_u:7797_1: pratighātacittatā vā upabhoktukāmatā vā sarvakleśaparitāpo vā duḥkhavedanānubhāvo
S04bsu016_u:7797_2: vā viṣayagatyupapattibhayaṃ vā bhavābhilāṣo vā abhiniveśo vā /
S04bsu016_u:7798: api tu khalu kulaputra nirdekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena anāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ vipulabodhisattvapraṇidhānabalavivardhanatāyai //
S04bsu016_u:7799: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7800: tasyāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputra ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau suprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7801: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyupapadyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:7802_0: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra daśānāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāṃ prāthamakalpiko dharmacakranirghoṣagaganapradīparājo
S04bsu016_u:7802_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:7804: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra tathāgato madhye [Gv_273] cāturdvīpakasya rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā nātidūre upapannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7805: tasyāḥ khalu punā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa suprabhaṃ nāma vanaṣaṇḍamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7806: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe vanaṣaṇḍe ratnakusumamegho nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7807: tasmin khalu ratnakusumameghe bodhimaṇḍe vairocanamaṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:7808: yatra sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīrājastathāgato niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7809: tena ca samayena manuṣyāṇāṃ daśa varṣasahasrāṇi āyuḥ pramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7810: atha prāṇātipātiṣu sarveṣu loke prādurbhūteṣu adattādāyiṣu kāmamithyācāriṣu mṛṣāvādiṣu paiśunikeṣu pāruṣikeṣu saṃbhinnapralāpiṣu abhidhyāluṣu vyāpannacitteṣu mithyādṛṣṭiṣu,
S04bsu016_u:7811_0: evaṃ daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vipulībhūteṣu supratiṣṭhiteṣu sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ
S04bsu016_u:7811_1: paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ bodhimaṇḍagato bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa lokendrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7811_2: ca pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ kuśalamūlaparipācanāya //
S04bsu016_u:7812: tena ca samayena tasyāṃ rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7813_0: tena adattādāyināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ caurāṇāṃ kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ prāṇātipātināṃ kāmamithyācāriṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7813_1: mṛṣāvādināṃ paiśunikānāṃ pāruṣikāṇāṃ saṃbhinnapralāpināṃ abhidhyālūnāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7814: rājñaḥ khalu punaḥ jayaprabhasya vijitāvī nāma putro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgato 'ṣṭaviṃśatibhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7815: atha sa sarasvatisaṃgītiprāsādābhirūḍho mahāstrīgaṇaparivāraparivṛtaḥ teṣāṃ cārakāvaruddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhagāḍhabandhanabaddhānāṃ bhairavamutkrośaśabdamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:7816_0: śrutvā ca punarudvignaḥ saṃvignacitto mahākaruṇāsaṃjātaḥ tasmātprāsādādavatīrya taccārake
S04bsu016_u:7816_4: keśābhicchāditakāyān urunigaḍabandhanabaddhān vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇān duḥkhavedanāmanubhavamānānanekavidhān
S04bsu016_u:7817: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahatkāruṇyamutpādya udārakaruṇāśayasaṃjātaḥ parahitādhāno 'dbhutacetāścārakagahanagatān sattvān samāśvāsayāmāsa bandhanavipramokṣāya /
S04bsu016_u:7818: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ datvā yena rājā jayaprabhastenopasaṃkramya evamāhayatkhalu devo jānīyāt - mayā bandhanāgārabandhanagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāruṇyādabhayaṃ dattam /
S04bsu016_u:7820: atha jayaprabheṇa rājñā sarvāṇi pañcāmātyaśatāni saṃnipātya paripṛṣṭāniyuṣmākaṃ kathaṃ bhavati?
S04bsu016_u:7821: ta āhuḥ - ete rājakośavilopino rājño vadhāya parākrāntāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7824: vadha evaiṣāṃ daṇḍo bandhanagatānāṃ vā maraṇam /
S04bsu016_u:7828: atha khalu sa vijitāvī rājaputro mahākaruṇāparipīḍitastānamātyān provācatathāstu yathā yūyaṃ vadatha /
S04bsu016_u:7836: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastān sarvān bandhanagatān sattvāṃstasmādbandhanāgārātparimocayati sma ātmaparityāgena sarvaparivāreṇa sarvadhanaskandhena /
S04bsu016_u:7837: sa tān parimocya yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhopadhānaṃ tadutsṛjya na vinivartayate sma /
S04bsu016_u:7838: atha tāni pañcāmātyaśatānyūrdhvabāhūni utkrośamānāni jayaprabhaṃ rājānamupasaṃkramya evamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - vijitāvinaḥ kumārasya cchandenāyaṃ rājakośo vilupyate /
S04bsu016_u:7840: yadi devo vijitāvino rājakumārasya nigrahaṇaṃ ca kariṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:7842: atha khalu jayaprabho rājā kupito vijitāvinaṃ rājakumāraṃ saha tairaparādhibhiḥ puruṣairvadhāyotsṛṣṭavān /
S04bsu016_u:7843_0: tasya mātā janetrī tacchrutvā udvignā strīsahasraparivṛtā pramuktakeśī nirābharaṇagātrī
S04bsu016_u:7843_1: svamukhaṃ vyālupya urastāḍayantī pāṃśvavakīrṇaśiraskā krandamānā ārtasvaraṃ rudantī
S04bsu016_u:7843_2: rājānamupasaṃkramya saparivārā caraṇayornipatya evaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa - pramuñca deva
S04bsu016_u:7845: atha rājā vijitāvinaṃ kumāraṃ saṃmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā evamāhaṃ - utsṛja kumāra etānaparādhino manuṣyān /
S04bsu016_u:7848: sa vadhamabhyupagatavānasaṃlīnena cittena asaṃkucitena sarvajñatārambaṇaprayuktena parahitapariṇatena mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamena /
S04bsu016_u:7849: tasya janetryā rājā jayaprabho 'rdhamāsaṃ yācito darśanāya-ardhamāsaṃ kumāro dānaṃ dadātu yasya yenārthaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7852: atha tasyā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā uttareṇa pūrvayajñavāṭaprakṛtaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ nāma mahodyānam /
S04bsu016_u:7853: tatra kumāro 'bhiniṣkramya yasya yenārthaḥ tasya tatprādāt /
S04bsu016_u:7854: tena nirargalaṃ yajñaṃ yajatā ardhamāsaṃ vividhā dānavidhayo dattāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7859_0: adrākṣīt sa mahājanakāyo vijitāvī ca rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7859_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ

S04bsu016_u:8705: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu anantaparyanteṣu dharmadhātuparameṣu ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣu vairocanasya pūrvapraṇidhānasāgarān prajānāmi avatarāmi anusmarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8737: ye ca bhagavatā purvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sattvasamudrāḥ paripācitāstānapyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8747: yathā ca bhagavato vairocanasya sarvasmin dharmadhātau bodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8748: evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparameṣvākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣvasaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8751: eṣa hi kulaputra asya sarvabodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8763: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāṃ śākyakanyāmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyamārye bodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:8764: āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa abhayaṃkarā nāma lokadhāturabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8765: tasyāṃ khalu lokadhātau gatipravaro nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8766: tasyāḥ khalu punarlokadhātormadhye kṣemāvatī nāma cāturdvīpikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8767: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya drumameruśrīrnāma rājadhānyabhūccaturaśīternagarakoṭīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:8770: teṣāṃ khalu punarmahānagarāṇāṃ sarvaratnavṛkṣahemajālālaṃkārādibhyo vātasaṃghaṭṭitebhyo bahutūryanirghoṣasamarutaniścaritebhyo 'yamevaṃrūpa ānandaśabdo niścarati sma - snāta,
S04bsu016_u:8777: tasyāṃ khalu drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt maṇḍalikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8780_0: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ pañca putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:8781: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma agramahiṣī abhūt teṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ strīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:8788: pādatalayoścāsya cakrāṇi jātāni sahasrārāṇi sanābhīni sanemikāni sarvākāraparipūrṇāni surucirāṇi darśanīyāni /
S04bsu016_u:8791: ubhe cāsya hastapādatale jālinī abhūtāṃ vicitrasuvibhaktācchidrāparisrāviṇī,
S04bsu016_u:8798: sa tairyān spṛśati striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:8801: tasya jaṅghe anupurvasamudgate abhūtāṃ racite vṛtte sujāte eṇeyasyeva mṛgarajñaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8805: tasya dvayoḥ pādayordvāvutsadau jātāvabhūtāṃ vṛttau sujātau suparipūrṇāvadṛśyasaṃdhī suracitau darśanīyau,
S04bsu016_u:8810: nāsya kaścitstrī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā vṛddho vā madhyo vā daharo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā nirvasanasyāpyapaśyadanyatra svaparibhogena naimittikena vā kāmopacitena /
S04bsu016_u:8814: khalu punarabhavat sūpacitaśarīraḥ suvibhaktasamucchrayaḥ sarvakāyasamabhāgapratiṣṭhitaḥ anūnagātraḥ anunnatagātro 'pariṇatagātro maṇiphalakavisṛṣṭātirekadyutigātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8820: vṛhadṛjugātramahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarabhavat sarvāvaropetaparamāṇusamagātraḥ praśamagātro gurugātraḥ prasannagātraḥ prahlādagātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8822: tasya yāvatyo grīvāsāmantakena mukhasāmantakena ca rasaharaṇyaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8823: tāḥ sarvāḥ samā abhūvan samantāḥ suparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8827: tasya kiṃcidbhaktaparibhogeṣu ekavāramapi mukhabhaktaṃ parivartamānamasaṃbhinnamabhyavahāramagamat antaśa ekodanabindurapi /
S04bsu016_u:8829: aviralā aviṣamā asya dantā abhūvan acchidrasaṃdhayaḥ samāṃ suvibhaktāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8831: vā upakledo vā abhiṣyando vā paryavanāho vā atisarjanaṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:8832_0: samadantatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ khalu punarabhavat samadanto nonadanto nādhikadanto
S04bsu016_u:8832_1: nonnatadanto na saṃnatadanto na saṃbhinnadantaḥ samantamadhyadanto 'nutsannadanto
S04bsu016_u:8833: suśukladaṃṣṭraśca kumāro 'bhūt nirupakleśadaṣṭraḥ suprasannadaṃṣṭraḥ supariśuddhadaṃṣṭraḥ susaṃsthitavicitradaṃṣṭraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8835: [Gv_311] prabhūtā cāsya jihvā abhūt tanvī mṛdvī sukumārā karmaṇyā kamanīyā laghuparivartinī mukhamaṇḍalasaṃchādanī tathyapathyārthavyañjanapadaniruktyadhiṣṭhānasaṃprayuktā /
S04bsu016_u:8840: abhinīlanetraśca sa kumāro 'bhūdacchanetraḥ pariśuddhanetraḥ prabhāsvaranetraḥ viprasannanetro 'bhirūpanetro
S04bsu016_u:8842: gopakṣmo sa kumāro 'bhūtpadmarāgasuviśuddhacakṣurāyatanaḥ samanetraraṅgaḥ samasadṛśanetraraṅgaḥ sujātanetraraṅgaḥ āyatanetraraṅgaḥ paripūrṇanetraraṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhitanetraraṅgaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8843: bhruvontare cāsya ūrṇā jātābhūnmṛdvī karmaṇyā sukumārākulasaṃsparśā svacchā śuddhā prabhāsvarā himaguḍikātuṣāravarṇā suśuklaraśmimaṇḍalaprabhāvabhāsā /
S04bsu016_u:8844_0: murdhni ca asyoṣṇīṣamabhinirvṛttamabhūt sujātaṃ samantaparimaṇḍalaṃ madhyābhinyastakeśālaṃkāraṃ
S04bsu016_u:8846: nāsya kāye rajo vā malo vā kledo vā jālaṃ vā valī vā śaithilyaṃ vā bhaṅgo vā prasaraṇaṃ vā visaraṇaṃ vā asamaṃ vā asthiṣata /
S04bsu016_u:8849: ekaikaromasya ekaikasmin romakūpe roma jātamabhūnnīlavaiḍūryavarṇapradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalajātaṃ suparisaṃcitaṃ suniviṣṭaṃ supratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu016_u:8850: ūrdhvāṅgaromā ca sa kumāro 'bhūdavinivartanīyaromā apratyudāvartanīyaromā asaṃsṛṣṭaromā /
S04bsu016_u:8853_0: tasya nīlāḥ keśā abhūvan vairocanamaṇiratnanīlavarṇanirbhāsāḥ snigdhā mṛdavaḥ sukuñcitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8853_1: pradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalinaḥ sujātamūlā anuddhatāḥ niṣpīḍitā asaṃlulitāḥ samasadṛśasthānasaṃsthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8854: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punaḥ tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'bhūt samantabhadraparimaṇḍalaḥ samantabhadraḥ samantaprāsādikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8856: pṛṣṭhato 'pi dakṣiṇato 'pi vāmato 'pi gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi atṛptikaramanāpacārudarśano 'bhut /
S04bsu016_u:8857_0: ebhiḥ kulaputra dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtakāyaḥ sa tejodhipatī rājakumāro
S04bsu016_u:8858: sa khalu kulaputra tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'pareṇa samayena pitrābhyanujñāto drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā gandhāṅkuraprabhameghaṃ nāmodyānam,
S04bsu016_u:8859_0: tatra bhūmidarśanāya abhiniryayau viṃśatyā kanyāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ mahatā puṇyatejautaḥśrīsaubhāgyavikurvitavyūhena
S04bsu016_u:8860_0: tasya tathā vrajato 'ṣṭavartmā mārgaḥ samavasthiṣata nimnonnatavigato 'pagataśarkarakaṭhallotsado
S04bsu016_u:8862: tatra keṣucidratnavyomakeṣu vividharatnaparipūrṇāni ratnabhājanāni sthāpitānyabhūvan yācanakasaṃghapratipādanakārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8870: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvākāravividhadivyamanojñavarṇagandhāḥ sarvagandhavidhayaḥ sthāpitā abhuvan vilepanārthināṃ yathābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8871: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvopakaraṇarāśayaḥ sthāpitā abhūvan sattvānāṃ yathāśayābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8872_0: keṣucidvyomakeṣu nāryo 'bhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vividhacārurūpaveśā vicitramanojñavastrasaṃdhitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8873: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūdrājaparibhogyā /
S04bsu016_u:8874_0: tasyāḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma dārikābhūdabhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā nātidīrghā
S04bsu016_u:8874_1: nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurā nātiśyāmā abhinīlanetrā abhinīlakeśī abhirāmavaktrā
S04bsu016_u:8874_2: brahmasvarā madhurapriyavādinī prājñā sarvakalāvidhijñā sarvaśāstrakovidā dakṣā analasā
S04bsu016_u:8874_3: sagauravā saprasādā maitracittā apratighātabahulā atṛptikaramanāpadarśanā mandarāgadoṣamohā
S04bsu016_u:8874_4: hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā mārdavā ṛjvī aśāṭyā amāyā [Gv_313] vinītā /
S04bsu016_u:8875_0: sā mātrā sārdhamanekakanyāparivṛtā ratnarathābhirūḍhā drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā niṣkramya
S04bsu016_u:8875_1: tejodhipate rājakumārasya purataḥ tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ parimārgayamāṇā rājājñāniyogādgacchantī
S04bsu016_u:8876_1: mātaraṃ sudarśanāmetadavocat - yatkhalu amba jānīyāḥ - sacenmāṃ tejodhipate rājakumārasya na dāsyasi,
S04bsu016_u:8883: api tu khalu punardārike gaṇikā vayaṃ sarvalokaratikarāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8885: vayaṃ hi rājño dhanapaterājñayā tejodhipateḥ kumārasyopasthānāya niryātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8888_0: tena ceha samayena sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
S04bsu016_u:8888_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:8890: tatra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgataḥ prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:8891: sa tayā dārikayā rathābhirūḍhayaiva pracalāyamānayā svapnāntare dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8892_0: prativibuddhāyāśca purāṇajñātisālohitayā devatayā ārocitam - eṣa dārike sūryagātrapravarastathāgato
S04bsu016_u:8894_0: ākāśadevatā abdevatā jvalanadevatā vāyudevatāḥ sāgaradevatāḥ nadīdevatā parvatadevatā

S04bsu016_u:8894_3: sarvadigdevatāśca saṃnipatitāḥ tasya bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya darśanāyeti //
S04bsu016_u:8895: sā tena tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataguṇaśravaṇena ca viśāradā bhūtvā avakāśapratilabdhā tejodhipate rājakumārasya puratastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:8896: rūpavareṇahu loki viśiṣṭā viśruta sarvadiśāsu guṇebhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8899: prāṇaśatā bahu naikasahasrā ye mama prekṣiṣu rāgavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:8900: nāpi ca rajyati mahya kumārā kasyacidantiki mānasu loke // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:8901: no ca mama pratihanyati cittaṃ nāpyanunīyati kutraci sattve /
S04bsu016_u:8902: nāpi ca me kvaci vairu na doṣaḥ sarvahite 'bhirataṃ mama cittam // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:8903: yada mi tvamapi dṛṣṭa kumāro rūpabalapravaro guṇadhārī /
S04bsu016_u:8904: tada indriya prīṇita sarve prīta mamo vipulā upajātā // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:8906: subhrulalāṭa sunāsā eṣa nivedayamī tava ātmā // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:8908: purato na virājami tubhyaṃ śyāmakṛtā maṣivigrahatulyā // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:8911: na ca te pratihanyati vācyaṃ agraruta pratigṛhṇami mahyam // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:8912: vadane tava jihva prabhūtā tāmratanū vipulā ratanābhā /
S04bsu016_u:8914: vadane sahitāstava dantā śaṅkhanibhā vimalā suvibhaktā /
S04bsu016_u:8916: smitu yehi vidarśayamānaḥ toṣayase janatāṃ naravīra // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:8917: tava lakṣaṇaśobhana kāyastriṃśa duveva prabhāsura śuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8918: samalaṃkṛtu yehi surūpaḥ cakradharo bhavitāsi narendrā // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:8919: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāmetadavocat - kasya tvaṃ dārike,
S04bsu016_u:8921: na mama dārike kalpate paraparigṛhīteṣu dāreṣu mamatāṃ kartum /
S04bsu016_u:8924: pṛcchāmi te brūhi mamaitamarthaṃ parigrahastvaṃ varagātri kasya // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:8925: mātā pitā vā tava kaccidasti bhartāpi vā svāmi parigraho vā /
S04bsu016_u:8926: sattvo 'pi cānyaḥ khalu yena saṃjñā kṛtā mameti tvayi saumyarūpe // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:8927: kaccinna hiṃsābhirataṃ manaste harasyadattaṃ khalu mā pareṣām /
S04bsu016_u:8928: mā kāmamithyācaraṇe ratiste mā vā mṛṣādya prasṛtaṃ manaste // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:8929: mā mitrabhedaprasṛtā matiste mā marmabhedīni vacāṃsi vakṣi /
S04bsu016_u:8930: mā te 'parakṣeṣu dhaneṣvabhidhyā vyāpādacittaṃ janatāsu cāpi // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:8931: mā dṛṣṭikāntārapathi sthitāsi mā karmavaṃśoddhuracetanā vā /
S04bsu016_u:8932: māyāvinī śāṭhyavaśānugā vā mā bādhase tvaṃ viṣameṇa lokam // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:8935: daridrabhūteṣu ca saṃgrahāya kaccitpradātuṃ prasṛtaṃ manaste // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:8936: premāsti kalyāṇasuhṛtsvatho vā dharmeṇa kāle ca vadanti ye tvām /
S04bsu016_u:8937: kāyasya cittasya ca kalyatāṃ te karmaṇyatāṃ vā janayanti samyak // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:8938: buddheṣu te gauravamasti kaccit premāpi vā buddhasuteṣu tīvram /
S04bsu016_u:8940: kaccitpare tiṣṭhasi dharmavaṃśe na cāpyadharmaṃ carituṃ matiste /
S04bsu016_u:8941: anantavarṇe ca guṇārṇave te kaccitparaṃ prema ca gauravaṃ ca // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:8943: āpāyike karmaṇi ca pravṛttā kaccidbhṛśārtā karuṇāyase tvam // 20 //

S04bsu016_u:8947: kalpānanantān caramāṇa caryāṃ kaccinna te prārthanayāsti khedaḥ // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:8948_0: atha khalu sudarśanā agragaṇikā sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyo dārikāyā mātā tejodhipatiṃ
S04bsu016_u:8948_1: rājakumārametadavocat - mamaiṣā kumāra dārikā upapādukā padmagarbhasaṃbhūtā nābhiniṣkrāntapūrvā gṛhāt /
S04bsu016_u:8950: māṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ śṛṇu rājaputra yaddārikā te paripṛcchateyam /

S04bsu016_u:8953: niśākṣaye yatra bhavān prasūtaḥ tatraiva jātā mama dārikeyam /
S04bsu016_u:8956: sālaprabhodyānavare madīye ciraṃ mayā tatra vinirgatāham // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:8960: vicitraratnāmbaradhāriṇībhiḥ gīte ca vādye ca suśikṣitābhiḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:8966: āsaṃstadā saṃśayitā janaughā rātryāṃ kimabhyudgata eṣa sūryaḥ // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:8971: na karmaṇo hyasti kṛtasya nāśaḥ pūrve sucīrṇasya vipāka eṣaḥ // 32 //
S04bsu016_u:8977: rutaṃ ca divyaṃ madhuraṃ ruvatyā gandho mukhādvāti yathotpalasya // 35 //

S04bsu016_u:8979: strīratnametatkhalu jātu loke na prākṛtānāṃ vaśamabhyupaiti // 36 //

S04bsu016_u:8986: śilpāni yāvanti ca sarvaloke pāraṃgateyaṃ nikhileṣu teṣu // 39 //
S04bsu016_u:8987: iṣvastravijñāna paraṃ vidhijñā sattvāna yuktau suviniścitā ca /

S04bsu016_u:8991: ye vyādhayaḥ kecana jīvaloke teṣāṃ samutthānanaye vidhijñā /

S04bsu016_u:9941: tāvupakramya tayoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā āryau anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /

S04bsu016_u:9945: tadvadatāṃ me āryau - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:9947: atha khalu śrīsaṃbhavo dārakaḥ śrīmatiśca dārikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocatām - iha āvābhyāṃ kulaputra māyāgato nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9948: tāvāvāṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatau māyāgataṃ sarvalokaṃ paśyāvo hetupratyayamāyāsaṃbhūtam /
S04bsu016_u:9959: kimāvābhyāṃ śakyamanantakarmamāyāviṭhapajālānugatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
S04bsu016_u:9960: atha khalu śrīsaṃbhavo dārakaḥ śrīmatiśca dārikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamacintyena kuśalamūlavegena abhiṣyandayitvā svaṃ ca vimokṣaviṣayaṃ śrāvya etadavocatām - gaccha kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:9964: tatra maitreyo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati janmabhūmikānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmanugrahāya /
S04bsu016_u:9969: [Gv_361] sarvatrānugatāṃ ca bodhisattvopapattivaśitāṃ prabhāvayan sarvasattvajanmasaṃdarśanābhimukhatayā ca sattvaparipākāriñcanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:9973: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryā paripraṣṭavyā,
S04bsu016_u:9986: sa hi kulaputra maitreyo bodhisattvo 'vatīrṇaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsu gatiṃgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9997: sa te kulaputra kalyāṇamitro 'bhiṣyandayiṣyati sarvakuśalamūlāni vivardhayiṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:10006: na ca te kulaputra ekakuśalamūlatanmayena bhavitavyaṃ naikadharmamukhālokāvabhāsaparameṇa naikacaryāparisaṃtuṣṭena naikapraṇidhānābhinirhāraparameṇa naikavyākaraṇena,
S04bsu016_u:10014: apramāṇāni hi kulaputra bodhisattvena kuśalamūlāni samudānetavyāni /
S04bsu016_u:10112: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra sarvasattvasamoktā bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvaparipācanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:10122: tasmāttarhi kulaputra na te parikheda utpādayitavyaḥ kalyāṇamitraparimārgaṇāsu /
S04bsu016_u:10170: kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10225: api ca kulaputra mātṛbhūtāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi buddhakuleṣu janayitrīṇi /
S04bsu016_u:10235: tasmāttarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇyupasaṃkramitavyāni pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhāravahanāpariṇamanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:10299: evaṃ kalyāṇamitrādhyāśayapariśuddhā hi kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrājñāsu pratipadyamānā vivardhante sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ himavatsaṃniśritā iva tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10313: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīṣu pratipannā bodhisattvā daśānabhilāpyaguṇakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratigṛhṇanti /
S04bsu016_u:10329_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kalyāṇamitrāguṇavarṇānuśāsanīṃ bodhisattvacaryāpramāṇatāṃ

S04bsu016_u:10329_2: śrīsaṃbhavasya dārakasya śrīmatyāśca dārikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya śrīsaṃbhavaṃ
S04bsu016_u:10329_3: dārakaṃ śrīmatīṃ dārikāṃ ca anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya
S04bsu016_u:10332: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanyabhiṣyanditacitto yena samudrakaccho janapadastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ tāmeva bodhisattvacaryānuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:10350: sa imamevaṃrūpamabhinirhāraprayogaṃ muhūrtaṃ vicārya adhimuktiśraddhāsamutthitena adhyāśayapraṇidhyabhinirhārabalena apratiprasrabdhamātmānamadhyatiṣṭhat sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu,
S04bsu016_u:10363: evaṃ jñānapraveśābhinirhṛtena saṃjñāmanasikāreṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako [Gv_370] vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya purastāt praṇipātitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10379: ye te lokaniketoccalitāśca sarvajagadbhavaneṣu saṃdṛśyante sarvasattvaparipācanāya /
S04bsu016_u:10380: ye te sarvakṣetrāniśritāśca sarvakṣetreṣu ca anuvicaranti tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:10381: ye te sarvakṣetrāṇi ca anuvicaranti sarvabuddhakṣetravyūhaparigrahaṇatāyai,
S04bsu016_u:10389: ye te sarvalokadhātvantargatakāyā na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10455: na ca mahāyānacyavanavihāriṇaḥ teṣāmayaṃ sarvaguṇavihāriṇāṃ vihāraḥ //
S04bsu016_u:10456: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:10457: iha so mahākaruṇa lābhi viśuddhabuddhirmaitreya maitraśiri lokahitābhiyuktaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10459: abhiṣekabhūmisthita jyeṣṭhasuto jinānāṃ viharāti buddhaviṣayaṃ anucintayantaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:10460: sarveṣa yo jinasutāna mahāyaśānāṃ mahājñānagocara vimokṣapratiṣṭhitānām /
S04bsu016_u:10461: ye dharmadhātu vicaranti asajjamānā āvāsu teṣamayamapratipudgalānām // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:10467: na karonti niśrayu kvacidgagane va pakṣī teṣāṃ vihāru ayu jñānaviśāradānām // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:10468: ye rāgadoṣamatha mohasvabhāva jñātvā saṃkalpahetujanitāṃ vitathapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:10469: nirvikalpayanti ca virāgamayīha teṣāṃ śāntapraśāntyumagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:10471: praparīkṣamāṇa na patanti vidū praśāntiprajñāupāyakuśalānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:10472: ye te anāvaraṇajñānadiśaṃ praviṣṭā jinakṣetra sattvaparikalpavikalpaśāntā /
S04bsu016_u:10473: bhāvasvabhāvarahitā na vimṛṣanti dharmān āvāsu teṣamaya śāntiparāyaṇānām // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:10474: ye te asaṅgacaritā ima dharmadhātuṃ vicaranti bhāvavigatā khagavāyubhūtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10477: ye dṛṣṭidurgatigatāṃ janatāmakhinnāṃ duḥkhāntarāṃ kaṭuka vedana vedayantīm /
S04bsu016_u:10478: maitraprabhāya śamayanti apāya sarvān āvāsu teṣamaya maitrakṛpāśayānām // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:10480: ye prekṣya lokamiha mokṣapathe praṇenti sārthātivāhasadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:10485: parimocayanti vipulāṃ karuṇāṃ janitvā mahavaidyarājadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:10486: ye te niśāmya janatāṃ dukhitāmatrāṇāṃ śokākare patita mṛtyusamudragāmi /
S04bsu016_u:10487: tārenti kṛva mahatīṃ śubhadharmanāvaṃ teṣāṃ vihāramaya dāśasutopamānām // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:10496: yatha eki sattvi tatha sarvajagatyaśeṣam āvāsu teṣamaya lokaparāyaṇānām // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:10497: ye ekakṣetraprasare aparāntakalpān vicaranti cārika jagārthamakhinnavīryāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10498: yatha ekakṣetri tatha sarvadaśaddiśāsu āvāsu teṣamaya vajradṛḍhāśayānām // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:10499: ye dharmamegha sugatāna daśaddiśāsu ekāsane sthita pibanti asaṃpramūḍhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10501: ye kṣetrasāgara vrajanti anābhilāpyān praviśanti co pariṣasāgara nāyakānām /
S04bsu016_u:10502: ye pūjasāgara vicitra jine karonti teṣāmasaṅgacaraṇānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:10504: bahukalpasāgara caranti jagaddhitārthā teṣāṃ vihāru ayu sarvaguṇākarāṇām // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:10505: ye eki vālapathi uttaramāna kṣetrāt buddhāṃśca sattva tatha kalpa anantamadhyān /
S04bsu016_u:10506: praviśanti enta na punā ca upenti sīmāṃ teṣāmasaṅganayanānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:10507: ye ekacittakṣaṇi kalpamahāsamudrān praviśanti kṣetra tatha buddhajagatpracārān /
S04bsu016_u:10510: ye sarvakṣetraparamāṇurajān gaṇitvā bindupramāṇa tulayitva jalaugha sarvam /
S04bsu016_u:10513: abhinirharanti vicaranti anantakalpān iha te praviṣṭa sugatāna sutāḥ smṛtīmāḥ // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:10514: iha te sthitā jinasutā vividhā vicitrā abhinirharanti bahuśāstrakathārthayuktāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10515: saukhyāvahāni jagatāmiha śilpasthānānyanucintayanta viharanti satāṃ vihāraḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:10516: iha te sthitā mahaabhijñaupāyajñāne yāvanta sattvagatibheda daśaddiśāsu /
S04bsu016_u:10517: sarvatra janmacyutibheda vidarśayanti māyāgate sthita vimokṣa asaṅgacaryāḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:10518: iha te sthitā prathamacittasamudbhavādyāṃ darśenti dharmacaryāṃ vasudharmaniṣṭhām /
S04bsu016_u:10520: ye ekacittaprasareṇa vibuddha bodhiṃ praviśanti jñānamatikarma anantamadhyā /
S04bsu016_u:10521: saṃmohaketvavraji loku ya cintayāna evaṃ durāsadagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:10528: iha te kṛpāśayamatī sthitvā jagadīkṣya duḥkhaśokahatam /
S04bsu016_u:10533: iha te sthitā jinasutāḥ sarvajinānāṃ ca pādamūleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10537: iha te praviṣṭa śūrāḥ sarvaṃ jinagocaraṃ tulayamānā /
S04bsu016_u:10551: iha sarvakṣetrasaṃkhyāṃ kalpānāṃ caiva dharmasaṃkhyāṃ ca /
S04bsu016_u:10553: iha te sthitā jinasutā yāvat kṣetrāstriyadhvasaṃkhyātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10555: iha te sthitā jinānāṃ caryāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca indriyaṃ jagatām /
S04bsu016_u:10564: sthitveha sattvasamatāṃ dharmeṣu buddhasamatāṃ ca prekṣya /
S04bsu016_u:10567: vimṛṣantyapare dharmāniha te bhavanavare sthitā dhīrāḥ // 52 //
S04bsu016_u:10569: śakyā mayā hi vaktuṃ vistīrṇo 'nantu buddhīnām // 53 //

S04bsu016_u:10577: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ vyavalokya sarvaparṣado dakṣiṇena hastenopadarśya bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃvarṇayan gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:10581: svāgataṃ praśamaśāntilocana mā kilāmyasi carantu cārikām // 57 //

S04bsu016_u:10586: sarvamitrabhajanāya prasthitā svāgataṃ ti acalā dṛḍhavratā // 59 //
S04bsu016_u:10587: svāgataṃ śubhapathena āgatā svāgataṃ guṇapathe pratiṣṭhitā /
S04bsu016_u:10588: svāgataṃ jinapathena prasthitā mā śramaṃ kila samarthasva kvacit // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:10589: ehi svāgatu guṇeṣu tanmayā svāgataṃ ti kuśalāni(bhi)syandita(?) /
S04bsu016_u:10590: sādhu svāgatamanantagocarā darśanaṃ tava sudurlabhaṃ jage // 61 //
S04bsu016_u:10594: krodharoṣavigatā anunnata sādhu te darśanaṃ sudarśanam // 63 //
S04bsu016_u:10601: ehi sarvajinaputrapreṣita darśayāmi ti anāvṛtāṃ diśam // 66 //
S04bsu016_u:10604: eṣamāṇu sugatāna gocaraṃ mārgamāṇu virajāna cārikām /
S04bsu016_u:10606: yatra śikṣita atīta nāyakāḥ śikṣiṣenti tatha ye anāgatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10607: tiṣṭhatāṃ ca sugatāna yā carī pṛcchamāṇu ayu tāmihāgataḥ // 69 //
S04bsu016_u:10610: bodhisattva mama buddhivardhikā buddhaputra mama bodhidāyakāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10611: eti mitra mama buddhavarṇitā evacittakuśalo ihāgataḥ // 71 //
S04bsu016_u:10620: nāyakā mama sukhaṃdadā ime evacitta ayu mitra sevate // 75 //
S04bsu016_u:10622: sarvadurgatiapāyaśodhakā eti mitra mama sādhu darśakāḥ // 76 //
S04bsu016_u:10624: eti sarvajinaguhyadhārakā eva mitra bhajateṣa paṇḍitaḥ // 77 //
S04bsu016_u:10627: paśyathā ayamudāraāśayaḥ sevamāna ima mitra paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10628: yādṛśīṃ pratijaneti sūrata eva yūyamanuśikṣatho sadā // 79 //
S04bsu016_u:10630: anuśāsti ayu tasya kurvato paśyathā kathamaṭatyakhedavān // 80 //
S04bsu016_u:10631: eṣa sarvasukhasaukhya ujjhiya utsṛjitva amaropamaṃ gṛham /
