S04bsu016_u:10645: śūrabhūta abhayasya dāyako deśiko hi jagatāṃ bhaviṣyati // 87 //
S04bsu016_u:10664: durlabho jagi sadevamānuṣe yādṛśo ayu viśuddhamānasaḥ // 96 //
S04bsu016_u:10678: eṣa lokaśaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ eṣa sarvajagati prabhākaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10685: yādṛśaṃ tava prayoga sūrataḥ śraddha yādṛśa tavā aninditaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10687: sarvabuddha nacireṇa drakṣyasi sarvakṣetra nacireṇa yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:10688: sarvadharma nacireṇa jñāsyasi tādṛśaṃ ti śubhamātmanā kṛtam // 106 //
S04bsu016_u:10691: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇān bhājanaṃ tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi śubhāna saṃbhavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10692: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi jinaurasaiḥ samo yādṛśaṃ ti adhimuktimaṇḍalam // 108 //
S04bsu016_u:10693: māramaṇḍala parājitaṃ tvayā karmamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ ca te /
S04bsu016_u:10694: kleśamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ tvayā yādṛśaṃ ti praṇidhānamaṇḍalam // 109 //
S04bsu016_u:10703: duḥkhajāla jagu mocayiṣyase tādṛśaḥ praṇidhijālu śodhitaḥ // 113 //
S04bsu016_u:10713: mokṣadvāramupaneṣyase jagat dvāru tādṛśu viśodhitaṃ tvayā // 118 //
S04bsu016_u:10716: bodhimārga tatha tvaṃ anuddhato mārgase dṛḍhamate atandritaḥ // 119 //
S04bsu016_u:10723: kṣetrasāgara bahu pravekṣyasi drakṣyase pariṣasāgarān bahūn /
S04bsu016_u:10729: tvaṃ samādhibhavanaṃ pravekṣyase tvaṃ vimokṣabhavanāni lapsyase /
S04bsu016_u:10737: nocireṇa spharamāṇu paśyase māruto va gagane asaṅgavān // 129 //
S04bsu016_u:10740: maiva kheda janayāhi sūratā tuṣṭi vindi vipulāṃ nirāmiṣam /
S04bsu016_u:10741: yena te imu vimokṣu īdṛśo dṛṣṭu paśyasi ca bhūyu drakṣyase // 131 //
S04bsu016_u:10743: tvaṃ samartha imu dhārituṃ nayaṃ tena paśyasi idaṃ vikurvitam // 132 //
S04bsu016_u:10744: yeṣa kalpanayutaiḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ kutu guṇaprabhāvana /
S04bsu016_u:10745: tehi dṛṣṭa carato sucārikāṃ buddhaputra aniketagocarāḥ // 133 //
S04bsu016_u:10746: lābha bhūya vipulā acintiyā svāgataṃ ca tava mānuṣo bhava /
S04bsu016_u:10747: yena mañjuśiri dṛṣṭa saṃmukhamīdṛśaṃ kṛtu guṇān bhājanam // 134 //
S04bsu016_u:10750: duḥkhadharma tvayi sarva ujjhitāḥ sarvakheda ca vivarjitā bhava // 135 //
S04bsu016_u:10752: jñānabhūmi paripūrya uttamā buddhabhūmi nacireṇa lapsyase // 136 //
S04bsu016_u:10756: ye bhajanti ima mitra īdṛśāḥ te bhavanti nacireṇa nāyakāḥ // 138 //
S04bsu016_u:10757: dṛṣṭva sattva vinayaṃgatā bahu bodhisattvacari citra yāvat /
S04bsu016_u:10758: mā tu jātu vimatiṃ kariṣyase sarvadharmamukha bodhicārikam // 139 //
S04bsu016_u:10760: yena saṃpada imā tvamīdṛśī buddhaputra iha adya paśyasi // 140 //
S04bsu016_u:10761: paśya lābha tava kīdṛśo mahān paśyato jinasutā nirantaram /
S04bsu016_u:10764: tena co jinasutā nirantaraṃ te vimokṣanaya darśayanti mām // 142 //
S04bsu016_u:10765: kalpakoṭinayutāni te janā saṃvasanti sugatātmajaiḥ saha /
S04bsu016_u:10767: te 'pi teṣu na vidanti gocaraṃ nātma tairhi guṇabhājanaṃ kṛtam // 143 //
S04bsu016_u:10768: tvaṃ śṛṇoṣi ima īdṛśaṃ nayaṃ paśyase ca sudurlabhaṃ jage /
S04bsu016_u:10770: sarvabuddha samanvāharanti te bodhisattva tava saṃgrahasthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10771: tvaṃ ca teṣa anuśāsanisthitaḥ sādhu sūdhana sujīvitaṃ tava // 145 //
S04bsu016_u:10772: bodhisattvakuladharmi vartase śikṣase jinasutāna tvaṃ guṇaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10773: bheṣyase sugatavaṃśavardhanaḥ prīti vindahi udāra sudhanā // 146 //
S04bsu016_u:10774: sarvabuddha pitarastavāsamā bodhisattva tava sarvi bhrātaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10775: bodhiaṅga tava sarvi jñātayaḥ tvaṃ sujātu sugatāna orasaḥ // 147 //
S04bsu016_u:10777: dharmarājamacireṇa lapsyase sūdhanā tuṣṭa bhava prīṇitendriyaḥ // 148 //
S04bsu016_u:10780: yādṛśaṃ vapati bīja yo naro tādṛśaṃ labhati tasya so phalam /
S04bsu016_u:10781: prīti vinda vipulāmacintiyāṃ eṣa te 'dya samanvāsayāmyaham // 150 //
S04bsu016_u:10783: cīrṇa kalpanayutāna ye carī bodhisattvanayutā acintiyā /
S04bsu016_u:10784: ta 'pi saṃpada labhanti nedṛśīmekajanmi pratilabdha yā tvayā // 151 //
S04bsu016_u:10785: sarvametadiha muktitaḥ phalaṃ āśayasya dṛḍhavīryatāya ca /
S04bsu016_u:10786: yasya cārika bhavediyaṃ priyā so dhareya sudhanasya yā carī // 152 //
S04bsu016_u:10788: sudhana eva samudānitāstvayā nityameṣa hi viśeṣacārikā // 153 //
S04bsu016_u:10791: eṣa bhotu tava darśito tayā bhadranāmacariyāya sūdhana /
S04bsu016_u:10792: eta jñātva sa kadāci bheṣyate sevamāna iha mitra tanmayaḥ // 155 //
S04bsu016_u:10793: kāyakoṭi smara pūrvikā tvayā kāmahetu kṣayitā nirarthakam /
S04bsu016_u:10794: adya bodhiya mārgaṇo hyayaṃ kāya tarjatu vratena suvrataḥ // 156 //
S04bsu016_u:10796: gaṅgavālikasamatā virāgitā buddha no ca śruta īdṛśo nayaḥ // 157 //
S04bsu016_u:10797: so idāni kṣaṇa labdha mānuṣo buddhapādu imu mitru īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10798: śrūyate ca varabodhicārikā viśuddhi na bhaviṣyate katham // 158 //
S04bsu016_u:10800: bhoti bhūya sugatāna saṃbhavo mitradharmaśravaṇaṃ ca śrūyate /
S04bsu016_u:10801: no ca śrūyati ayaṃ punarnayo āśayo yadi na bhoti śodhitaḥ // 159 //
S04bsu016_u:10804: teṣa lābha paramā acintiyāsteṣa mānuṣabhavaḥ suāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10805: yairiyaṃ cari praveśamīdṛśaṃ śrutva eva praṇidhī bhirnirhṛtā // 161 //
S04bsu016_u:10806: tasya sarvi sugatā na durlabhā tasya sarvi jinaputra nārataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10807: tasya bodhayi na bhūyu saṃśayo yena eva adhimukti śodhitā // 162 //
S04bsu016_u:10808: tena sarvi vinayā na varjitāḥ tena sarvadukhadharma ujjhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10809: tena sarvaguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ yo imaṃ nayu praviṣṭa īdṛśam // 163 //
S04bsu016_u:10810: nocireṇa imu kāyu ujjhiyā buddhakṣetra pariśuddha yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:10812: pūrvahetughana tubhya sūdhana pratyutpanna adhimukti niścitā /
S04bsu016_u:10813: mitra sevasi viśeṣaarthikaḥ tena vardhayi jale yathotpalam // 165 //
S04bsu016_u:10819: yādṛśāya adhimuktisaṃpadā vandanaṃ kṛtamidaṃ tvayā mama /
S04bsu016_u:10824: bhadranāma vara carya uttamāṃ tanumantime praveśayiṣyati // 170 //
S04bsu016_u:10825: eva maitraku asaṅgagocaro dṛṣṭa sūdhana guṇaiḥ samudgatam /
S04bsu016_u:10826: darśayitva pariṣāya saṃmukhaṃ varṇakośamimu tasya vyāhari // 171 //
S04bsu016_u:10827: śrutva sūdhana tadānuśāsanīmīdṛśīṃ ca anuśāsti uttamām /
S04bsu016_u:10830: utthihitva sudhanaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ maitra nāma kurute pradakṣiṇam // 173 //
S04bsu016_u:10831: tasya mañjuśiri tena tejasā puṣpahāraratanā ca pāṇiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10834: sūdhano varaprahṛṣṭamānaso maitrakasya kṣipi tāni harṣitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10835: tasya śīrṣu parimārjate tadā maitranātha sudhanaṃ ca bhāṣate // 175 //
S04bsu016_u:10836: sādhu sādhu jinaputra sūdhana yasya te aparikheda īdṛśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10837: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇāna bhājanaṃ mañjughoṣu yatha yādṛśo va ham // 176 //
S04bsu016_u:10838: śrutva sūdhana udānudānayi durlabhā bhavaśateṣu īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10839: mitra yebhiriha me samāgamaḥ sādu āgamanamadya me iha // 177 //
S04bsu016_u:10841: mitra labdha maya durlabhā ime bhotu me laghu samāgamasvayi // 178 //
S04bsu016_u:10842: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10843: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:10895: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:10902: mahābodhicaryārambhaṃ samāśvāsayati sadevakaṃ lokaṃ na visaṃvadati,
S04bsu016_u:10906: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ tatparṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamupadarśayannevamāha - paśyatha kulaputrā imaṃ śreṣṭhiputram,
S04bsu016_u:10917_1: paryupāsīno mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena saṃpreṣito dhanyākarānnagarādupādāya sarvadakṣiṇāpathamaṭan
S04bsu016_u:10918_4: mahādharmayajñasaṃbhāropacayodyuktānāṃ nāmadheyaśravaṇaṃ vā rūpakāyadarśanaṃ vā gocarasaṃvāso
S04bsu016_u:10920: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sarvajagatparitrāṇāya abhyutthitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:10922_0: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sattvānāṃ caturoghottaraṇatāyai mahādānaṃ mahādharmanāvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:10922_5: mahāśvāsaṃ dātukāmo bhavacārakāvaruddhānāṃ jñānaprahāṇaṃ dātukāmo dṛṣṭibandhanabaddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:10923: sa eṣa kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ evaṃ sattvaparitrāṇāya apratiprasrabdho bodhicittotpādaviśuddhiṃ parimārgamāṇo 'yamaparikhinno mahāyānasamudānayāya,
S04bsu016_u:10946: na hi kulaputrastāmanye bodhisattvāḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairbodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhiparipūrimadhigamiṣyante buddhabodhau vasanto bhaviṣyanti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau vā,
S04bsu016_u:10957_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūtaguṇavarṇakīrtanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:10957_1: kṛtvā tadārambaṇaṃ ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgāśayaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat
S04bsu016_u:10958: yena te sarvalokahitasukhāya sarvasattvadhātuparitrāṇāya sarvabuddhadharmapratilambhāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:11098: tasmāttarhi kulaputra yena anuttarāyāṃ samaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
S04bsu016_u:11108: evameva kulaputra sarvajñatācittauṣadhiparigṛhīto bodhisattvo rāgāgninā na dahyate,
S04bsu016_u:11115: evameva bodhicittajñānauṣadhiparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarvasaṃsāropakramabhayāni na bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:11120: tadyathā kulaputra aparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhītaḥ puruṣo 'jayo bhavati sarvaśatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:11121: evameva sarvajñatācittāparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikamaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:11122: tadyathā kulaputra asti vigamo nāma bhaiṣajyam /
S04bsu016_u:11125: tadyathā kulaputra asti sudarśano nāma mahābhaiṣajyarājaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11128: tadyathā kulaputra asti saṃtāno nāma mahābhaiṣajyavṛkṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11131: evameva bodhisattvabījasaṃbhūtaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃtānavṛkṣaḥ sahadarśanena śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ karmakleśavraṇān saṃrohayati /
S04bsu016_u:11134: yasyāḥ prabhāvena sarvajambudvīpakā [Gv_399] vṛkṣā sarvā vivardhante,
S04bsu016_u:11148: evameva bodhicittādṛśyamahauṣadhigṛhīto vyavakīrṇavihārī bodhisattvaḥ sarvamāraviṣaye na dṛśyate /
S04bsu016_u:11149: tadyathā kulaputra asti sarvamaṇiratnasamuccayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnarājaṃ mahāsamudre /
S04bsu016_u:11150: tasya anyalokadhātvasaṃkrāntasya asthānamanavakāśo yanmahāsamudrasya sarvakalpoddāhāgninā śakyaṃ tālamātramapi pariśoṣayitum /
S04bsu016_u:11160: tadyathā kulaputra udakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ kaivarta udake na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:11161: evameva sarvajñatācittodakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnagṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃsārasāgare na mriyate /
S04bsu016_u:11163: tena sahagate kaivartādayo jalajīvinaḥ sarvanāgabhavanāni praviśanto 'dhṛṣyā bhavanti sarvanāgoragaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11165: tadyathā kulaputra śakrābhilagnamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ śakro devarājo sarvadevagaṇānabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11167: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamahāmaṇiratnagṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvadāridryānna bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:11171: tadyathā kulaputra candrakāntaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ candrābhayā spṛṣṭamudakadhārāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:11173: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇimakuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājānāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
S04bsu016_u:11175: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra jagadvyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvasattvābhiprāyaparipūraṇatayā na kadācitkṣayamupaiti,
S04bsu016_u:11177: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino mahāmaṇiratnaḥ sa tamondhakāravidhamaṃ gacchati,
S04bsu016_u:11187: tadyathā kulaputra vaiḍūryamaṇiratnaṃ varṣaśatasahasramapi amedhyamadhyagataṃ tiṣṭhat sarvadaurgandhyena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
S04bsu016_u:11189: tadyathā kulaputra ekamāgneyaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
S04bsu016_u:11190: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādāgneyamahāmaṇiratnaṃ vipaśyanāsaṃprayuktaṃ yoniśo manasikārataḥ sarvamajñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
S04bsu016_u:11191: tadyathā kulaputra mahāsamudre potāropitamanardhyeyamaṇiratnaṃ vaṇigghastagataṃ nagarapratiṣṭhāni kācamaṇiśatasahasrāṇyabhibhavati varṇataśca āyataśca,
S04bsu016_u:11193: tadyathāsti vaśirājaṃ nāma maṇiratnaṃ yajjambudvīpagatameva catvāriṃśadyojanasahasrasthitānāṃ candrasūryamaṇḍalānāṃ bhavanavimānapratibhāsavyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:11197: sarve te vaśirājamaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante,
S04bsu016_u:11200: sarvāṇi tāni bodhicittotpādavaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante /
S04bsu016_u:11201: tadyathā kulaputra asti sāgaravyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yatsarvamahāsāgaravyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:11203: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇiratnaṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ divyena jāmbūnadasuvarṇena,
S04bsu016_u:11204: evameva sarvajñajñānacintārājamahāmaṇiratnaṃ [Gv_401] sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ bodhicittotpādadivyajāmbūnadasuvarṇena /
S04bsu016_u:11205: tadyathā kulaputra nāgamaṇḍalasiddha āhituṇḍikaḥ sarvanāgoragān vaśe sthāpayati,
S04bsu016_u:11207: tadyathā kulaputra praharaṇagṛhītaḥ śūro durgharṣo bhavati śatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:11208: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvakleśaśatrumaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:11209: tadyathā kulaputra divyoragasāracandanasya ekacūrṇadhāraṇaṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ gandhena spharati,
S04bsu016_u:11210: karṣapramāṇaṃ sarvatrisāhasre lokadhāturatnaparipūrṇena mūlyaṃ na kṣamate,
S04bsu016_u:11213: tadyathā kulaputra himavaccandanaṃ nāma mahācandanaratnaṃ sarvadāhaṃ praśamayati,
S04bsu016_u:11218: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11220: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta sarvajñatāvarṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11221: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya cchavigandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:11222: sa sarvajambudvīpe sarvavārṣikājātisumanādīnāṃ puṣpajātīnāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11225: tadyathā kulaputra pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya śuṅgībhūtasya veditavyaṃ bahūnāṃ puṣpaśatasahasrāṇāmāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
S04bsu016_u:11226: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapāriyātrakavṛkṣasya kuśalamūlaśuṅgībhūtasya veditavyamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sāsravanāsravabodhikusumāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu016_u:11227: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitasya pāriyātrakusumairvastrasya tailasya vā gandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:11228: sa divasatasahasraparibhāvitasya campakavārṣikāsumanābhivastrasya vā tailasya vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:11229: evameva ya ekajanmaparibhāvitasya sarvajñatācittasaṃtānasya bodhisattvaguṇajñānagandho daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhapādamūleṣu pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:11231: tadyathā kulaputra asti nālīkerī nāma vṛkṣajātiḥ udyatake samudre saṃbhūtā /
S04bsu016_u:11232: sā mūlata upādāya yāvatpuṣpaphalaparyantātsarvakālaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ na kadācinnopajīvyā bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:11233: evameva mahākaruṇāpraṇidhimūlasaṃjāto bodhisattvasya prathamasarvajñatācittotpādo yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyavasānāt sadevakasya lokasya na kadācinnopajīvyo bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:11234: tadyathā kulaputra asti hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātam /
S04bsu016_u:11236: na ca tadrasapalaṃ śakyaṃ tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ na lohīkartum /
S04bsu016_u:11237: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni [Gv_402] paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti /
S04bsu016_u:11238: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaṃ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:11239: tadyathā kulaputra kiyatparītto 'pyagniryāvadupādānaṃ labhate tāvatīṃ jvālāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:11243_0: akṣaya eva pradīpo bhavatyaparyādattaḥ sarvapradīpaniryāṇaiḥ evameva ekasmātsarvajñatācittotpādapradīpādatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11243_1: sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpānāṃ dīpyamānānāmakṣaya eva sa ekaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo
S04bsu016_u:11244: tadyathā kulaputra ekaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vātāyane vā praveśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11245: sahapraveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitamapi tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati avabhāsaṃ ca karoti,
S04bsu016_u:11249: tadyathā kulaputra yādṛśī pradīpavartirbhavati tādṛśaṃ pradīpo 'vabhāsaṃ karoti,
S04bsu016_u:11251: evameva yasya bodhisattvasya yādṛśī praṇidhānavartiviśeṣatā bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11255: tadyathā kulaputra divyajāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāro vaśavartino devarājasya mūrdhnāvabaddho 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvakāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11257: tadyathā kulaputra siṃhasya mṛgarājasya nādena acirajātāḥ siṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti,
S04bsu016_u:11259: evameva tathāgatapuruṣasiṃhasya bodhicittasaṃvarṇanasarvajñatānādena prayuktena sarvādikarmikabodhisattvasiṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti buddhadharmaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11266: evameva kalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitaḥ karmakleśakṣīramahāsamudraḥ tathāgatamahāpuruṣasiṃhasarvajñatācittotpādadugdhaikabinduprakṣepeṇa sarvo 'navaśeṣaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:11269: tadyathā kulaputra aṇḍakośādanirgatasya kalaviṅkapotasya yo nādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvabalavegasaṃpannānāṃ himavannivāsināṃ sarvapakṣigaṇānāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11270: evameva yaḥ saṃsārāṇḍakośagatasyādikarmikabodhisattvakalaviṅkapotasya mahākaruṇābodhicittanādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:11271: tadyathā kulaputra yo 'cirajātasya mahāgaruḍendrapotasya pakṣavātabalaparākramo nayanapariśuddhiguṇaśca,
S04bsu016_u:11272: [Gv_403] sa sarvaśarīrapravṛddhānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11275: tadyathā kulaputra mahāpuruṣahastagato nārācaḥ kiyaddṛḍhamapi varma nirbhinatti,
S04bsu016_u:11280: evameva mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāviṣṭasya bodhisattvamahānagnasya yāvadadhyāśayavadane sarvajñatācittotpādapiṭakā na vigacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:11282: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ śikṣitasyeṣvastrāntevāsina iṣvastrajñāne kṛtābhyāsasya śilpasthānayogabalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11284: evameva yaḥ sarvādikarmikasya sarvajñatābhūmyā kṛtābhyāsasya bodhisattvājāneyasya praṇidhijñānādhimukticaryābalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11286: tadyathā kulaputra iṣvastraṃ śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandhayogyābhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati sarveṣvastrajñānasya,
S04bsu016_u:11287: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñabhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamaṃ sarvajñatācittādhyāśayasaṃprasthānaṃ pūrvagamaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhadharmādhigamāya /
S04bsu016_u:11288: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya māyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya prathamamantrapadasiddhyabhinirhārameva manasikurvāṇasya sarvakriyāsiddhirbhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11289: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayavikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathamacittotpādapraṇidhānābhinirhāra evotthāpako bhavati sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayasya /
S04bsu016_u:11290: tadyathā kulaputra sarvamāyāvidyāmantrāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanāḥ sarvamāyānirmāṇarūpagatāni saṃdarśayanti cittotpādena,
S04bsu016_u:11292: tadyathā kulaputra mārjārasya sahadṛṣṭavicāramātreṇa sarvamūṣikā vilayamāpadyante,
S04bsu016_u:11294: tadyathā kulaputra jāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāra ābaddhaḥ sarvābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti,
S04bsu016_u:11296: tadyathā kulaputra ayaskāntarājasya kiyatparītto 'pi dhātuḥ sarvadṛḍhamāyasaṃ bandhanaṃ sphoṭayati,
S04bsu016_u:11302: evameva yatra yatraiva sarvajñatācittotpādadhāturvicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktau vā,
S04bsu016_u:11303: tatastata eva karmakleśāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktayaśca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu016_u:11305: tadyathā kulaputra makaraviddhāśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarvodakaprāṇibhayavinirvṛto bhavatyanupaghātaśarīro makaramukhagato 'pi,
S04bsu016_u:11307: tadyathā kulaputra amṛtapānapītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaparopakramairna mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:11308: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāmṛtapānapīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakabhūmiṣu na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:11310: tadyathā kulaputra añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvamanuṣyabhavaneṣu cānuvicarati na ca sarvamanuṣyairdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11313: tadyathā kulaputra mahārājasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaprākṛtajanāt na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:11317: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:11318: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibheti /
S04bsu016_u:11319: tadyathā kulaputra vajrapraharaṇagṛhītaḥ śakro devendraḥ sarvāsuragaṇaṃ pramardayati,
S04bsu016_u:11321: tadyathā kulaputra rasāyanopayuktaḥ puruṣo dīrghamāyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11322: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādarasāyanasaṃbhāraprayukto bodhisattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaranna parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11324: tadyathā kulaputra sarvabhaiṣajyarasasaṃprayogeṣu pānīyaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ na kvacidduṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:11327: tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasya sarvakāryeṣu jīvitendriyaṃ pūrvaṃgamam,
S04bsu016_u:11329: tadyathā kulaputra jīvitendriyavimuktaḥ puruṣo nirupajīvyo bhavati mātāpitṛjñātivargasya sarvakarmāsamarthatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:11330: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaviyukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāguṇanirupajīvyo bhavati sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānapratilambhāsamarthatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:11336: tadyathā kulaputra acirajāto rājaputro mūrdhaprāptān sarvavṛddhāmātyānabhibhavati kulābhijātyādhipatyena,
S04bsu016_u:11338: tadyathā kulaputra kiyadvṛddhenāpyamātyena kiyadbālasyāpi rājakumārasya praṇipatitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11339: na ca rājaputreṇa vṛddhāmātyasya gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam,
S04bsu016_u:11340: evameva kiyadvṛddhairapi ciracaritabrahmacaryaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11341: na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam /
S04bsu016_u:11342: tadyathā kulaputra [Gv_405] sarvāparibhūto rājaputro 'virahito rājalakṣaṇena sarvāgratāprāptairapi rājāmātyairna samo jātyadhyakṣatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:11347: tadyathā kulaputra sarvavidyauṣadhisaṃgrahasaṃprayukto bhaiṣajyavigraho darśanasparśanasaṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānāṃ vyādhīn śamayati,
S04bsu016_u:11349: tadyathā kulaputra haṃsalakṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvakardamadoṣairna kliśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11351: tadyathā kulaputra mūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhīto dāruvigraho na vikīryate,
S04bsu016_u:11355: tadyathā kulaputra śalyavimuktaṃ yantramakāryasamarthaṃ bhavati tānyeva dārupratyaṅgāni,
S04bsu016_u:11358: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino hastigarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaruratnam /
S04bsu016_u:11359: tena saha dhūpitamātraḥ sarvarājñaścaturaṅgabalakāyo vihāyase tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu016_u:11360: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāgarudhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni sarvatraidhātukavyativṛttāni bhavanti asaṃskṛtasarvatathāgatajñānagaganagocaraparyavasānāni /
S04bsu016_u:11365: tasya mūlapratiṣṭhānaṃ nopalabhyate sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśasaṃkusumitā ca vṛkṣeṣu jālībhūtā ca saṃdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11368: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netare bhājane tiṣṭhacchobhate,
S04bsu016_u:11370: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu śobhate,
S04bsu016_u:11376: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11378: [Gv_406] tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
S04bsu016_u:11382: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11385: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11387: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
S04bsu016_u:11388: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
S04bsu016_u:11389: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
S04bsu016_u:11391: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
S04bsu016_u:11393: evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,
S04bsu016_u:11396: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
S04bsu016_u:11399: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:11400: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
S04bsu016_u:11401: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
S04bsu016_u:11403: evameva bodhicittotpādavajraṃ sarvakarmakleśodakena sarvakarmasaṃvāsairna klidyate na svidyate /
S04bsu016_u:11404: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
S04bsu016_u:11408: niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
S04bsu016_u:11409_0: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11409_1: paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11409_3: mahādharmameghān saṃdhārayatāṃ te mahākuśalamūlabalādhānavegā nānyena cittena śakyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11410: iti hi [Gv_407] kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11411: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,
S04bsu016_u:11414: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya //
S04bsu016_u:11415: api ca kulaputra yadvadasi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11418: asya vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya abhyantaraṃ praviśya vyavalokaya /
S04bsu016_u:11421: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evamāha - vivṛṇu ārya asya kūṭāgārasya dvāram /
S04bsu016_u:11423: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya kūṭāgārasya dvāramūlamupasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā acchaṭāśabdamakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11426: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paramāścaryaprāptastatkūṭāgāraṃ prāviśat /
S04bsu016_u:11428_0: so 'drākṣīt taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ bahuyojanaśatasahasravistīrṇaṃ gaganatalāpramāṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11433: te cāsya kūṭāgāravyūhā anyonyāsaṃbhinnā anyonyāmaitrībhūtā anyonyāsaṃkīrṇāḥ pratibhāsayogena ābhāsamagaman ekasminnārambaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:11436_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya
S04bsu016_u:11437: samanantarapraṇipatitamātraśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānabalena sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣvabhyantarapraviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:11439: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamaṃ praṇidhānacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu016_u:11440_0: yannāmagotropapannena yena kuśalamūlena yayā samādāpanayā yena kalyāṇamitrasaṃcodanena
S04bsu016_u:11440_1: yadāyuḥpramāṇena yannāmake kalpe yatratathāgate yadvyūhe yādṛśyāṃ parṣadi yādṛśena
S04bsu016_u:11443: yāvacca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya ca tathāgatasya tena samayenāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:11444: tāvatkāle tasya tathāgatasya pādamulagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:11446: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamo maitrasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11447: yata upādāya asya maitreya iti saṃjñodapādi tadadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11456: yathā vyākṛto yena vyākṛto yāvaccireṇa ca vyākṛtastatsarvamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11457: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ cakravartirājabhūtaṃ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11469: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prabhayā mahānarakānavabhāsya narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvanirayaduḥkhaṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11471: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pretabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ vipulamannapānamupasaṃhṛtya kṣutpipāsāṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11472: kvacitkūṭāgāre tiryagyonau vividhopapatyāyatanavimātratayā tiryagyonigatān sattvān vinayantamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11479: kvacidyāvaddaśabhūmisthitairbodhisattvaiḥ saha maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvabhūmivaiśeṣikatāṃ saṃgāyantamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11491_0: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ nānāvimātratāṃ janmakulavimātratāṃ kāyavyūhāpramāṇavimātratāmāyurvimātratāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11492: madhye ca vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya ekamudārataraṃ vistīrṇataraṃ ca tadanyasarvakūṭāgārāśeṣasarvavyūhātiriktataravyūhasamalaṃkṛtaṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11494: tasmiṃśca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭīśataṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ koṭīśataṃ tuṣitabhavanānāmadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11495: sa tatra jambudvīpeṣu maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ padmagarbhagataṃ jāyamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11496_0: śakrabrahmābhyāṃ pratīkṣyamāṇaṃ saptapadāni prakrāntaṃ daśa diśo vyavalokayamānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11496_1: mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadantaṃ sarvakumārabhūmiṃ saṃdarśayamānaṃ antaḥpuramadhye gatamudyānabhūmiṃ
S04bsu016_u:11496_3: paribhuñjānaṃ bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrāntaṃ māraṃ dharṣayamāṇaṃ bodhiṃ vibudhyamānaṃ bodhivṛkṣamanimiṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11498: sarvatra ca tatra sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
S04bsu016_u:11499_1: smṛtyadhiṣṭhānajñānena sarvasaṃjñāgatavyavasitāyāṃ jñānabhūmau sthito yāvanti teṣu
S04bsu016_u:11501_1: bodhicittamutpādayati amukaṃ dharmamukhaṃ śrutvā amukena kalyāṇamitreṇa samādāpito

S04bsu016_u:11740_2: paripācanārthaṃ jambudvīpe ca janmopapattisaṃdarśanārthamiha dakṣiṇāpathe māladeṣu
S04bsu016_u:11741: so 'haṃ kulaputra iha dakṣiṇāpathe anenopāyena yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāvineyānāṃ paripākavinayaṃ kurvan ihaiva vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhe kūṭāgāre [Gv_418] prativasāmi /

S04bsu016_u:11875_0: yāśceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ tā api sarvāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11877: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparā adrākṣīt,
S04bsu016_u:11878_0: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11879: yathā ca samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇamadrākṣīt etadvikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānam,
S04bsu016_u:11880: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhagavato bhadraśriyastathāgatasya padmaśriyāṃ lokadhātāvetadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11882: evaṃ samantātsarvadigvidikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva
S04bsu016_u:11885: evaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatapādamūleṣu mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11886_0: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi
S04bsu016_u:11890: sa tadacintyaṃ samantabhadramahābodhisattvavikrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca daśa jñānapāramitāvihārān pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:11903: tasyaivaṃ jñānapāramitāvihārasamanvāgatasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadrao bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:11904: samanantarapratiṣṭhāpitaśca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mūrdhni pāṇiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11915: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagataḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya murdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
S04bsu016_u:11916: tathā sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:11917_1: sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya
S04bsu016_u:11918: yathā bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagatena samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena pāṇinā spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
S04bsu016_u:11920: evaṃ sarvasamantabhadrātmabhāvaprasṛtaiḥ pāṇimeghaiḥ spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya dharmamukhānyavakrāntānyabhūvan nānānayaiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:11921: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra mama vikurvitam?
S04bsu016_u:11923: api tu tathāgataḥ prajānan prajānīyāttāvadacintyamidaṃ vikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:11924: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān vicaritaḥ sarvajñatācittamabhilaṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11926: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe sarvatyāgasamāyuktāḥ sarvalokavighuṣṭā mahāyajñā yaṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11945: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe 'nabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ parameśvarabhūtena satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11947: teṣāṃ ca asmiṃstathāgatānāṃ śāsane pravrajitā sarvabuddhānuśāsanīṣu pratipannaḥ śāsanaṃ ca me teṣāṃ saṃdhāritam //
S04bsu016_u:11948: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tāvadbhiḥ kalpasamudrerekacittotpādamapi tathāgaśāsane vilopamutpādayituṃ nābhijānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:11949_1: vā ātmagrahaparigrahacittaṃ vā ātmaparanānātvacittaṃ vā bodhimārgavipravāsacittaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11949_2: vā saṃsārasaṃvāsaparikhedacittaṃ vā avalīnacittaṃ vā āvaraṇasaṃmohacittaṃ vā utpādayitumanyatra
S04bsu016_u:11950: iti hi kulaputra sarvakalpasāgarāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuḥ tānnirdiśato ye mama pūrvayogasaṃbuddhakṣetrapariśuddhiprayogāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11956: tāvadbhyo me kulaputra dharmasamudrebhyo na kiṃcidekapadavyañjanamapi yanna cakravartirājyaparityāgena krītam,
S04bsu016_u:11959_0: tena mayā kulaputra anena evaṃrūpeṇa saṃbhārabalena mūlahetūpacayabalena udārādhimuktibalena
S04bsu016_u:11962: nāhaṃ kulaputra anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇapathamapyāgacchāmi prāgeva darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:11964: ye mama nāmadheyaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:11970: santi svapne nāmadheyaśravaṇena avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:11972_0: kecidardhamāsaṃ kecinmāsaṃ kecidvarṣaṃ kecidvarṣaśataṃ kecitkalpaṃ kecitkalpaśataṃ
S04bsu016_u:11981: iti hi kulaputra buddhākṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairupāyaiḥ sattvā avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:11982: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā mama buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu016_u:11987: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyamupanidhyāyannadrākṣīt ekaikasmin romavivare 'nabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrasāgarān buddhotpādaparipūrṇān /
S04bsu016_u:11989: sarvāṃśca tān kṣetrasāgarān nānāpratiṣṭhānān nānāsaṃsthānān nānāvyūhān nānācakravālān nānāmeghagaganasaṃchannān nānābuddhotpādān nānādharmacakranirghoṣānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11991: tathā anavaśeṣataḥ sarvaromavivareṣu sarvalakṣaṇeṣu sarvānuvyañjaneṣu sarvāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu /
S04bsu016_u:11992_1: daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūn spharitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyakaṃbodhau sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //
S04bsu016_u:11993: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvāvavādānuśāsanyanuśiṣṭaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvakāyāntargateṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvavatīrya sattvān paripācayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:11994: ye ca khalu punaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamakalyāṇamitropasaṃkramadarśanaparyupāsanajñānālokakuśalamūlopacayāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11995: te samantabhadrabodhisattvasahadarśanena kuśalamūlopacayasya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayānti,
S04bsu016_u:11997: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamante saprathamacittotpādāya yāvatsamantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:12000_1: pareṇa aparāntakoṭīgatakalpādhiṣṭhānalokadhātuṃ pareṇa vikrameṇa paryantaṃ nopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:12005: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe ca anantamadhyān kṣetrasāgarānavatarati sma,
S04bsu016_u:12009_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparaṃparānabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:12009_1: kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotayamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
S04bsu016_u:12010: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12011: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:12018: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:12020: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:12023: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:12025: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:12026: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:12027: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:12028: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:12029: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṅgataprāptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12030: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṃ cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:12035: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:12036: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca ghriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
S04bsu016_u:12037: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:12038: yāvat keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12040: yāvat keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12041: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:12042: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
S04bsu016_u:12043: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:12047: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:12048: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet /
S04bsu016_u:12050: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:12051: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
S04bsu016_u:12052: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:12053: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12054: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:12056: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:12057: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
S04bsu016_u:12058: kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:12059: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12060: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu // 24 //
S04bsu016_u:12061: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
S04bsu016_u:12062: teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:12064: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:12066: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12068: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān /
S04bsu016_u:12069: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:12076: ekakṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpapraveśa ahaṃ praviśeyam /
S04bsu016_u:12077: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam // 32 //
S04bsu016_u:12078: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
S04bsu016_u:12079: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // 33 //
S04bsu016_u:12083: ye ca ānāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:12084: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:12096: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣān bhadracarīya vibudhyiya bodhim // 41 //
S04bsu016_u:12098: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12099: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 42 //
S04bsu016_u:12101: yādṛśa nāmana bhadra vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:12103: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // 44 //
S04bsu016_u:12104: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
S04bsu016_u:12105: apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // 45 //
S04bsu016_u:12106: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:12107: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvataniṣṭha mama praṇidhānam // 46 //
S04bsu016_u:12108: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā rathaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
S04bsu016_u:12109: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam // 47 //
S04bsu016_u:12112: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12113: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracaripraṇidhānam // 49 //
S04bsu016_u:12115: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣa janma /
S04bsu016_u:12116: yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // 50 //
S04bsu016_u:12117: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
S04bsu016_u:12118: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // 51 //
S04bsu016_u:12119: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12121: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
S04bsu016_u:12122: budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //
S04bsu016_u:12123: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
S04bsu016_u:12124: buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //
S04bsu016_u:12125: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:12126: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //
S04bsu016_u:12128: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
S04bsu016_u:12129: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
S04bsu016_u:12130: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:12132: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
S04bsu016_u:12133: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //
S04bsu016_u:12134: tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12135: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //
S04bsu016_u:12137: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:12138: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
S04bsu016_u:12139: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //
S04bsu016_u:12146: te cāryasamantabhadrabodhisattvapramukhā yauvarājyābhiṣiktāḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamā mahābodhisattvā nānālokadhātusaṃnipatitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:12149: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu016_u:12151: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tethāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu016_u:12152: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
